data.anv: भुवि earth, राज्ञाम् for kings, यादृशाः such, ऋद्धिविशेषाः special kinds of wealth, दृश्यन्ते seen, तादृशैः with such, वानराः monkeys, भर्तृसत्क्रियाम् the last rites to the revered leader, डह here, कुर्वन्तु may be done.
data.md: Let the monkeys perform the obsequies of our master with such grandeur as befits the riches of the kings on this earth, a

data.v: अङ्गदमप्रिगृह्याशु तारप्रभृतयस्तथा । क्रोशन्तः प्रययुः सर्वे वानरा हतबान्धवाः ।।
data.es: Tara, Angada and the other bereaved monkeys hastened to perform the funeral ceremony of Valiweeping.
data.anv: वालिनः Vali, तादृशम् such, और्द्वदैहिकम् funeral rites, क्षिप्रम् quickly, प्राकुर्वन् did, तदा then, हतबान्धवाः (whose) relative (Vali) was dead, तारप्रभृतयः Tara and others, सर्वे all, वानराः monkeys, अङ्गदम् Angada, परिगृह्या taking with, क्रोशन्तः  were crying aloud, आशु fast, प्रयमुः walked.

data.v: ताराप्रभृतयः सर्वा वानर्यो हतयूथपाः । अनुजग्मुर्हि भर्तारं क्रोशन्त्यः करुणस्वनाः ।।
data.es: Tara along with other female monkeys followed their lord, crying pathetically.
data.anv: हरियूथपाः chief of the monkey troops, ताराप्रभृतयः Tara and others, सर्वाः all, वानर्यः  female monkeys, करुणस्वनाः with pathetically, क्रोशन्त्यः crying, भर्तारम् husband, अनुजग्मुः went following, हि indeed.

data.v: तासां रुदितशब्देन वानरीणां वनान्तरे । वनानि गिरयः सर्वे विक्रोशन्तीव सर्वतः ।।
data.es: When the female monkeys were weeping in the midst of the forest, it looked as if the forest and the hills were also mourning.
data.anv: वनान्तरे in the midst of the forest, तासाम् of them, वानरीणाम् of female monkeys, रुदितशब्देन by their cries, सर्वतः all over, वनानि forest, गिरयश्चैव and the mountains, विक्रोशन्तीव looked as if they were mourning.
data.md: In response to the bewailings of she-monkeys, hills and forests, as if, bewailed on all sides.

data.v: पुलिने गिरिनद्यास्तु विविक्ते जलसंवृते । चितां चक्रुः सुबहवो वानरा वनचारिणः ।।
data.es: Tormented with tears, the monkeys prepared in a solitary place surrounded by waters a pyre on the sandbank of a mountain stream.
data.anv: शोककर्शिताः agonzied, सुबहवः many, वानराः monkeys, गिरिनद्याः of a mountain stream, जलसंवृते surrounded by flow of water, विविक्ते in a solitary place, पुलिने on the sand bank, चिताम् a pyre, चक्रुः prepared.
data.md: Monkeys, ranging in the forest, made funeral piles on the banks of the hill-streams and in solitary watery nooks. Thereupon laying down from their shoulders the conveyance, those foremost of monkeys stationed themselves in a corner, being stricken with grief.

data.v: अवरोप्य ततः स्कन्धाच्छिबिकां वहनोचिताः । तस्थुरेकान्तमाश्रित्य सर्वे शोकसमन्विताः ।।
data.es: Putting down the palanquin from their shoulders on the lonely spot, the bearers stood in tearswaiting.
data.anv: ततः then, सर्वे all, वाहनोचिताः the carriers of the palanquin, स्कन्धात् from their shoulders, शिबिकाम् palanquin, अवरोप्य brought down, शोकसमन्विताः filled with sorrow, एकान्तम् solitary place, आश्रित्य resorting to, तस्थुः stood.

data.v: ततस्तारा पतिं दृष्ट्वा शिबिकातलशायिनम् । आरोप्याङ्के शिरस्तस्य विललाप सुदुःखिता ।।
data.es: Seeing her husband lying in the palanquin, Tara, full of grief placed Vali's head on her lap and cried.
data.anv: ततः then, तारा Tara, शिबिकातलशायिनम् who was lying on the sibika, पतिम् husband, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, सुदुःखिता a lady full of grief, तस्य his, शिरः head, अङ्के on her lap, आरोप्य  placed, विललाप cried.
data.md: And Tārā, beholding her husband's body on the conveyance, placed his head on her lap and bewailed, overwhelmed with griet.

data.v: जनं च पश्यसीमं त्वं कस्माच्छोकाभिपीडितम् । प्रहृष्टमिव ते वक्त्रं गतासोरपि मानद । अस्तार्कसमवर्णं च लक्ष्यते जीवतो यथा ।।
data.es: 'O revered self even though you are bereft of life, your face looks cheerful. It carries the colour of the setting Sun, and looks the same when you were alive.
data.anv: मानद revered self, गतासोरपि even though you are bereft of life, ते your, अस्तार्कसमवर्णम् bears the colour of the setting Sun, वक्त्रम् face, जीवतो यथा the same colour when you were alive, इह here, प्रहृष्टम् happy, दृश्यते appears.
data.md: O conferrer of honours, your countenance looks as if beaming with joy; although you are dead, and you appearest as if alive, having the hue of the setting Sun.

data.v: एष त्वां रामरूपेण कालः कर्षति वानर । येन स्म विधवाः सर्वाः कृता एकेषुणा रणे ।।
data.es: 'O monkey a single arrow from Rama who appeared in the forest in the form of death dragged you away from us and turned us all into widows.
data.anv: वानर monkey, एषः कालः this god of death, त्वाम् you, रामरूपेण in the form of Rama, कर्षति dragged away, येन by that, वने in the forest, एकेषुणा with a single arrow, सर्वाः all, विधवाः widows, कृताः are turned.
data.md: O monkey, Death himself, under the semblance of Rāma, is attracting you, who with one shaft in the battle, has rendered us all widows.

data.v: इमास्तास्तव राजेन्द्रवानर्यो वल्लभाः सदा । पादैर्विकृष्टमध्वानमागताः किं न बुध्यसे ।।
data.es: 'O king of kings why don't you understand that these female monkeys, your wives who were dear to you have come on foot this long distance with great difficulty?
data.anv: राजेन्द्र O king of kings, तव your, ताः those, वानर्यः female monkeys, वल्लभाः wives who were dear to you, पादैः on foot, तव your, विकृष्टम् long, अध्वानम् path, आगताः have come, किम् why, न बुध्यसे do you not know.
data.md: O best of kings, these she-monkeys cannot go by jumping. Did you not perceive that they have travelled so far on foot?

data.v: तवेष्टा ननु नामैता भार्याश्चन्द्रनिभाननाः । इदानीं नेक्षसे कस्मात्सुग्रीवं प्लवगेश्वरम् ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys these moonfaced wives were indeed once your favourites. Why don't you look at them? Why don't you look Sugriva?
data.anv: प्लवगेश्वरम् lord of monkeys, इमाः these, चन्द्रनिभाननाः moonfaced women, भार्याः wives, तव you, इष्टाः ननु your favourite ones indeed, इदानीम् now, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, कस्मात् why, न वेक्षसे  not seeing.
data.md: Those your wives, having moon-like countenances, have always your welfare in view. Why did you not, O best of monkeys, cast your looks towards them and Sugrīva?

data.v: एते हि सचिवा राजंस्तारप्रभृतयस्तव । पुरवासिजनश्चायं परिवार्यासतेऽनघ ।।
data.es: 'O king O sinless hero Tara and others, your ministers as well as the inhabitants of the capital are here sitting around you.
data.anv: राजन् O king, तारप्रभृतयः Tara and others, एते these, तव सचिवाः your ministers, अयम् this, पुरवासिजनः inhabitants of the capital, परिवार्य by surrounding you, आसते they are sitting, अनघ O sinless hero.
data.md: O king, these your counsellors, your wives headed by Tårā, and all these citizens are bewailing around you.

data.v: विसर्जयैनान्प्रवलान्यथोचितमरिंदम । ततः क्रीडामहे सर्वा वनेषु मदिरोत्कटाः ।।
data.es: 'O conqueror of enemies give these monkeys their due in accordance with their status and send them back as you used to do when they were passionately sporting in your company here in this forest.
data.anv: अरिन्दम O conqueror of enemies, एतान् all of them, प्लवगान् monkeys, यथोचितं in accordance with their position, विसर्जय send them, ततः then, मदनोत्कटाः in a passionate way, सर्वाः all of us, वनेषु in the forest, क्रीडामहे will be sporting.
data.md: O slayer of foes, do you despatch your counsellors to the city and we shall all enjoy in this forest, excited with amour.

data.v: एवं विलपतीं तारां पतिशोकपरिप्लुताम् । उत्थापयन्ति स्म तदा वानर्यः शोककर्शिताः ।।
data.es: The griefstricken female monkeys helped Tara, overwhelmed with sorrow due to her husband's death, rise from the ground.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, विलपतीम् mourning, पतिशोकपरिप्लुताम् overwhelmed with sorrow due to the death of the husband, ताराम् Tara, तदा then, शोककर्शिताः those overtaken by grief, वानर्यः female monkeys, उत्थापयन्ति स्म helped her to stand up.
data.md: The other she-monkeys, worked with sorrow, raised up Tārā bewailing thus being exercised with grief consequent upon the demise of her husband.

data.v: सुग्रीवेण ततः सार्धमङ्गदः पितरं रुदन् । चितामारोपयामास शोकेनाभिहतेन्द्रियः ।।
data.es: Then Angada, helped by Sugriva, placed his father's body on the pyre, with his senses numbed in deep sorrow.
data.anv: ततः then, सः अङ्गदः that Angada, सुग्रीवेण सार्धम् along with Sugriva, रुदन् crying, शोकेन in sorrow, अभिहतेन्द्रियः with his senses numbed, पितरम् father, चिताम् on the pyre, आरोपयामास placed.
data.md: Thereupon Angada along with Sugrīva, overwhelmed with grief, weeping, placed his Sire's body on the funeral pile.

data.v: ततोऽग्निं विधिवद्दत्त्वा सोऽपसव्यं चकार ह । पितरं दीर्घमध्वानं प्रस्थितं व्याकुलेन्द्रियः ।।
data.es: Overwhelmed with sorrow, he offered fire to the father who had set out on a long journey (to heaven). As per tradition he went round the pyre anteclock wise.
data.anv: ततः then, सः he, व्याकुलेन्द्रियः with disturbed senses, विधिवत् as per tradition, अग्निम् fire, दत्वा offering, दीर्घम् long distance, अध्वानम् way, प्रस्थितम् departing, पितरम् to father, अपसव्यं चकार went round once in an anteclock manner.
data.md: And putting fire duly, he circumambulated his Sire, bound for a journey for good.

data.v: संस्कृत्य वालिनं ते तु विधिपूर्वं प्लवंगमाः । आजग्मुरुदकं कर्तुं नदीं शीतजलां शुभाम् ।।
data.es: The monkeys set Vali's body to be consumed by fire as per tradition and proceeded to an auspicious river of pure water in order to offer oblation (to the departed soul).
data.anv: प्लवङ्गमाः monkeys, तं वालिनम् that Vali, विधिवत् as per tradition, संस्कृत्य after allowing it to be consumed by fire, उदकं कर्तुम् made waterofferings, शुभजलाम् a place of pure water, शिवाम् auspicious, नदीम् river, आजग्मुः reached.
data.md: Having duly cremated Vāli's body, the foremost of monkeys arrived at a river of auspicious water with a view to perform the watery ceremony.

data.v: ततस्ते सहितास्तत्र अङ्गदं स्थाप्य चाग्रतः । सुग्रीवतारासहिताः सिषिचुर्वालिने जलम् ।।
data.es: Then the monkeys along with Sugriva and Tara positioning Angada in the forefront made waterofferings (to Vali) collectively.
data.anv: ततः then, सुग्रीवतारासहिताः along with Sugriva and Tara, ते वानराः those monkeys, तत्र there, सहिताः collectively, अङ्गदम् Angada, अग्रतः in front, स्थाप्य by placing, जलम् water, सिषिचुः they offered.
data.md: And all these monkeys along with Sugrīva and Tārā, placing Angada before them, sprinkled water.

data.v: सुग्रीवेणैव दीनेन दीनो भूत्वा महाबलः । समानशोकः काकुत्स्थः प्रेतकार्याण्यकारयत् ।।
data.es: Mighty Rama, who was equally sorrowful and pitiable as Sugriva, directed the performance of funeral rites.
data.anv: महाबलः mighty, काकुत्स्थ: Kakutstha, दीनेन by the piteous, सुग्रीवेण with Sugriva, इव as though, समानशोकः equally sad, दीनः pitiable one, भूत्वा was equally, प्रेतकार्याणि funeral rites, अकारयत् directed.
data.md: And the highly powerful Käkutstha, equally aggrieved like Sugriva, being as poorly, conducted duly the obsequious ceremonies of Vali.

data.v: ततः शोकाभिसंतप्तं सुग्रीवं क्लिन्नवासनम् । शाखामृगमहामात्राः परिवार्योपतस्थिरे ।।
data.es: Then the chiefs of the army of the monkeys surrounded Sugriva, who was overcome with grief and was still in wet clothes (since he had taken bath at the conclusion of the funeral rites) and waited.
data.anv: ततः then, शोकाभिसन्तप्तम् griefstricken , क्लिन्नवाससम् whose clothes were wet, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, शाखामृगमहामात्राः  chiefs of army of monkeys, परिवार्य surrounded, उपतस्थिरे waited in attendance.
data.md: And thereupon those foremost of monkeys waited there, surrounding Sugrīva exercised with grief and wearing wetted cloth. And they all, approaching the mighty-armed Rāma of unwearied actions, stationed themselves with folded hands like to the great ascetics around the Grand-Father of the celestials).

data.v: अभिगम्य महाबाहुं राममक्लिष्टकारिणम् । स्थिताः प्राञ्जलयः सर्वे पितामहमिवर्षयः ।।
data.es: Just like sages stand before the creator Brahma, all the monkeys stood with folded hands before the longarmed Rama, the remover of sorrow.
data.anv: सर्वे all, पितामहम् creator Brahma, ऋषयः इव like sages, महाबाहुम् longarmed, अक्लिष्टकारिणम्  who removes sorrow, रामम् to Rama, अभिगम्य having approached, प्राञ्जलयः with folded hands, स्थिताः stood.
data.md: And thereupon those foremost of monkeys waited there, surrounding Sugrīva exercised with grief and wearing wetted cloth. And they all, approaching the mighty-armed Rāma of unwearied actions, stationed themselves with folded hands like to the great ascetics around the Grand-Father of the celestials).

data.v: ततः काञ्चनशैलाभस्तरुणार्कनिभाननः । अब्रवीत्प्राञ्जलिर्वाक्यं हनुमान्मारुतात्मजः ।।
data.es: On hearing the words of Rama in deep distress, the monkey replied to him with folded hands, his throat choked with tears:
data.anv: ततः then, काञ्चनशैलाभः of the hue of the golden mountain, तरुणार्कनिभाननः whose face was like the rising Sun, मारुतात्मजः son of the Windgod, हनूमान् Hanuman, प्राञ्जलिः with folded hands, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Thereupon Hanuman, the son of Marut, resembling a golden hill and having a countenance resembling the rising Sun, spoke with folded hands, saying.

data.v: भवत्प्रसादात्सुग्रीवः पितृपैतामहं महत् । वानराणां सुदुष्प्रापं प्राप्तो राज्यमिदं प्रभो ।।
data.es: 'O Lord by your grace Sugriva inherited the ancestral kingdom which would have been otherwise difficult.
data.anv: प्रभो O lord, सुग्रीव: Sugriva, सुदुष्प्रापम् that which is difficult to acquire, वानराणाम् of monkeys, इदम् this, पितृपैतामहम् ancestral, महत् great, राज्यम् kingdom, भवत्प्रसादात् by your grace, प्राप्तः has obtained.
data.md: By your assistance, O Kākutstha, O lord, this great ancestral kingdom of the highly powerful monkeys, having sharpened teeth, incapable of being acquired by the high-souled ones, has been attained to (by Sugrīva). Being commanded by you, he along with his friends, entering this city, shall perform the royal duties.

data.v: भवता समनुज्ञातः प्रविश्य नगरं शुभम् । संविधास्यति कार्याणि सर्वाणि ससुहृज्जनः ।।
data.es: 'Permitted by your gracious self, he will enter the auspicious city along with his friends and perform his duties. He had his auspicious bath in fragrant waters with medicinal herbs as per tradition.
data.anv: अयम् he, ससुहृज्जनः along with friends, भवता by you, समनुज्ञातः permitted, शुभम् auspicious, नगरम् city, प्रविश्य on entering, विविधैः with different kinds of, गन्धैः with fragrants, औषधैश्च with medicinal herbs, यथाविधि as per tradition, स्नातः bathed, सर्वाणि all, कार्याणि works, संविधास्यति will do.

data.v: स्नातोऽयं विविधैर्गन्धैरौषधैश्च यथाविधि । अर्चयिष्यति रत्नैश्च माल्यैश्च त्वां विशेषतः ।।
इमां गिरिगुहां रम्यामभिगन्तुमितोऽर्हसि । कुरुष्व स्वामि संबन्धं वानरान्संप्रहर्षयन् ।।
data.es: 'He wants to propitiate you first specially with garlands and gems. Pray enter this beautiful mountain cave for the pleasure of the monkeys and establish relationship with king Sugriva.'
data.anv: माल्यैश्च with garlands, रत्नैश्च and with gems, विशेषतः specially, त्वाम् you, अर्चयिष्यति he will propitiate you, त्वम् you, रम्याम् delightful, इमाम् this, गिरिगुहाम् mountain, अभिगन्तुम् to reach, अर्हसि proper for you, वानरान् to monkeys, स्वामिसम्बन्धम् relationship with the king, कुरुष्व establish, सम्प्रहर्षय please.

data.v: एवमुक्तो हनुमता राघवः परवीरहा । प्रत्युवाच हनूमन्तं बुद्धिमान्वाक्यकोविदः ।।
data.es: Requested by Hanuman who was skilful in conversation, wise Rama, slayer of enemies, replied:
data.anv: हनुमता Hanuman, एवम् in that way, उक्ता spoken, सर्वभूतहिते in the interest of all beings, रता committed, धर्मचारिणी noble woman, तापसी female ascetic, हनूमन्तम् to Hanuman, प्रत्युवाच replied.
data.md: Being thus accosted by Hanumān, the highly intelligent Rāghava, skilled in speech and the slayer of foes, replied;

data.v: चतुर्दशसमाः सौम्य ग्रामं वा यदि वा पुरम् । न प्रवेक्ष्यामि हनुमन्पितुर्निर्देशपालकः ।।
data.es: 'Dear Hanuman In obedience to my father's command I should not enter any village or city for fourteen years.
data.anv: सौम्य dear, हनुमन् Hanuman, पितुः father's, निर्देशपालकः obedient to  father's command, चतुर्दश fourteen, समाः years, ग्रामं वा a village or, यदि वा or if, पुरम् a city, न प्रवेक्ष्यामि I will not enter.
data.md: O gentle Hanuman, abiding by my Sire's mandate, I shall not enter a hamlet or a city for these fourteen years.

data.v: सुसमृद्धां गुहां दिव्यां सुग्रीवो वानरर्षभः । प्रविष्टो विधिवद्वीरः क्षिप्रं राज्येऽभिषिच्यताम् ।।
data.es: 'Let Sugriva enter the beautiful prosperous cavern (Kishkinda) and be installed by you as king with due rituals.'
data.anv: सुसमृद्धाम् highly prosperous, रम्यां beautiful, गुहाम् cavern, प्रविष्टः he will enter, वीरः a brave man, वानरर्षभः a bull among monkeys, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, क्षिप्रम् at once, विधिवत् with due rituals, राज्ये kingdom, अभिषिच्यताम् be installed.
data.md: Let Sugrīva, the foremost of monkeys, enter this magnificent celestial cave and do you all install him speedily on the throne.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा हनूमन्तं रामः सुग्रीवमब्रवीत् । इममप्यङ्गदं वीर यौवराज्येऽभिषेचय ।।
data.es: Having thus spoken to Hanuman, Rama who knew etiquette addressed mighty Sugriva, endowed with wisdom:
data.anv: वृत्तज्ञः knower of etiquette, रामः Rama, हनूमन्तम् to Hanuman, एवम् in that way, उक्त्वा having said, वृत्तसम्पन्नम् endowed with wisdom, उदारबलविक्रमम् mighty strong, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Having thus addressed Hanumān, Rāma spoke to Sugriva, saying:-Conversant with customs as you are, do you install this generous and heroic Angada, gifted with gifted with prowess and honouring customs, as the heir-apparent of the throne.

data.v: पूर्वोऽयं वार्षिको मासः श्रावणः सलिलागमः । प्रवृत्ताः सौम्य चत्वारो मासा वार्षिकसंज्ञिताः ।।
data.es: 'O noble Sugriva the four months from now will be rainy season. This is Sravana, the first month of the season in which rain is expected to start pouring.
data.anv: सौम्य O noble lord, वार्षिकसज्ञिकाः known as rainy days, चत्वारः मासाः four months, प्रवृत्ताः  commenced, अयम् this, सलिलागमः rain has started pouring down, वार्षिकः in the rainy season, पूर्वः first one, श्रावण मासः month of Sraavana.
data.md: O gentle one, this month of Sravana, which is the first of those four months which make up the rainy season, has set in and this is not the time therefore enter your auspicious city and I shall live in this mountain along with Lakṣmaṇa.

data.v: नायमुद्योगसमयः प्रविश त्वं पुरीं शुभाम् । अस्मिन्वत्स्याम्यहं सौम्य पर्वते सहलक्ष्मणः ।।
data.es: 'O goodnatured Sugriva this is not a suitable time for any endeavour. Go to the auspicious capital city of Kishkinda and I will reside on the mountain with Lakshmana.
data.anv: सौम्य O goodnatured Sugriva, अयम् this, उद्योगसमयः time for enterprise, न not, त्वम्  you, शुभाम् auspicious, पुरीम् capital of Kishkinda, प्रविश you may enter, अहम् I, सहलक्ष्मणः along with Lakshmana, अस्मिन् पर्वते on this mountain, वत्स्यामि will reside.
data.md: O gentle one, this month of Sravana, which is the first of those four months which make up the rainy season, has set in and this is not the time therefore enter your auspicious city and I shall live in this mountain along with Lakṣmaṇa.

data.v: इयं गिरिगुहा रम्या विशाला युक्तमारुता । प्रभूतसलिला सौम्य प्रभूतकमलोत्पला ।।
data.es: 'Dear Sugriva this cavern of the mountain is large and airy. It has abundant water resources with lotuses and lilies.
data.anv: सौम्य dear Sugriva, इयम् this, गिरिगुहा cavern of the mountain, रम्या delightful, विशाला large, युक्तमारुता with adequate breeze, प्रभूतसलिला with abundant water nearby, प्रभूतकमलोत्पला with lotuses and lilies.
data.md: Pleasant indeed is this mountain cave, spacious, filled with air, water and many lotuses.

data.v: कार्तिके समनुप्राप्ते त्वं रावणवधे यत । एष नः समयः सौम्य प्रविश त्वं स्वमालयम् । अभिषिञ्चस्व राज्ये च सुहृदः संप्रहर्षय ।।
data.es: 'Enter the city and get yourself installed and cheer your friends. Make all arrangement for killing Ravana when the month of Kartika begins as it is the proper time (for the purpose).
data.anv: कार्तिके when Kartika, समनुप्राप्ते sets in, त्वम् you, रावणवधे for the slaying of Ravana, यत you try, सौम्य O good Sugriva, एषः this, नः for us, समयः proper time, त्वम् you, स्वम् your, आलयम् city, प्रविश enter, राज्ये in the kingdom, अभिषिक्तस्व on installing yourself, सुहृदः to your friends, सम्प्रहर्षय cheer them .
data.md: You shall engage in endeavours to bring about the destruction of Rāvana, after Kārtika sets in. This is not the proper time, O gentle one, and do you enter your own city. And being installed on the throne do you enhance the joy of your friends.

data.v: इति रामाभ्यनुज्ञातः सुग्रीवो वानरर्षभः । प्रविवेश पुरीं रम्यां किष्किन्धां वालिपालिताम् ।।
data.es: Thus permitted by Rama , Sugriva, lord of the monkeys entered the beautiful city of Kishkinda (once) ruled by Vali.
data.anv: इति thus, रामाभ्यनुज्ञातः permitted by Rama, वानराधिपः lord of monkeys, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, वालिपालिताम् ruled by Vali, रम्याम् beautiful, किष्किन्धां पुरीम् Kishkinda city, प्रविवेश entered.
data.md: Being thus commanded by Rāma, Sugrīva, the foremost of monkeys entered the pleasant city of Kiskindha, reared by Vali.

data.v: तं वानरसहस्राणि प्रविष्टं वानरेश्वरम् । अभिवाद्य प्रहृष्टानि सर्वतः पर्यवारयन् ।।
data.es: Thousands of monkeys entered the city of Kishkinda along with their king, and stood in attendance everywhere.
data.anv: वानरेश्वरम् lord of monkeys, प्रविष्टम् entered, तम् him, अभिवाद्य welcomed, वानरसहस्राणि thousands of monkeys, प्रविष्टानि entered, सर्वतः all, पर्यवारयन् standing in attendance.
data.md: Encircling that lord of monkeys thousands of them entered the city.

data.v: ततः प्रकृतयः सर्वा दृष्ट्वा हरिगणेश्वरम् । प्रणम्य मूर्ध्ना पतिता वसुधायां समाहिताः ।।
data.es: Then all the subjects of the city collected together, prostrated to the chief of the monkey clan with their forehead touching the ground (as a mark of respect) and sat down.
data.anv: ततः then, सर्वाः all, प्रकृतयः people of the city, हरिगणेश्वरम् to the chief of monkey clan, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, मूर्ध्ना with the forehead touching the ground, प्रणम्य having prostrated, समाहिताः all collected together, वसुधायाम् on the floor, पतिताः fell.
data.md: Beholding the lord of monkeys, the subjects bowed to him, lowering their heads on the ground.

data.v: सुग्रीवः प्रकृतीः सर्वाः संभाष्योत्थाप्य वीर्यवान् । भ्रातुरन्तःपुरं सौम्यं प्रविवेश महाबलः ।।
data.es: Asking the monkeys to rise to their feet, the mighty and powerful Sugriva entered the inner chambers of his brother.
data.anv: वीर्यवान् mighty, महाबलः powerful, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, सर्वाः all, प्रकृतीः subjects, उत्थाप्य having lifted them up, सम्भाष्य addressed, भ्रातुः brother's, सौम्यम् gentle, अन्तःपुरम् inner chambers, प्रविवेश entered.
data.md: Welcoming the subjects and raising them up; the highly powerful Sugrīva entered the pleasant inner apartment of his brother.

data.v: प्रविश्य त्वभिनिष्क्रान्तं सुग्रीवं वानरर्षभम् । अभ्यषिञ्चन्त सुहृदः सहस्राक्षमिवामराः ।।
data.es: With Sugriva,the lord of the monkeys, returned to Kishkinda, his kith and kin coronated him just as the gods consecrated the thousandeyed Indra.
data.anv: प्रविश्य having entered, त्वभिनिष्क्रान्तं and returned, प्लवगेश्वरम् lord of monkeys, सुग्रीवम्  Sugriva, सुहृदः friends and relations, अमराः gods, सहस्राक्षम् Indra, इव like, अभ्यषिञ्चन्त performed consecration.
data.md: On his entering the city, his friends installed the highly powerful foremost of monkeys-Sugrīva, on the throne like to the celestials placing the thousand-eyed Deity (on the kingdom).

data.v: तस्य पाण्डुरमाजह्रुश्छत्रं हेमपरिष्कृतम् । शुक्ले च बालव्यजने हेमदण्डे यशस्करे ।।
तथा सर्वाणि रत्नानि सर्वबीजौषधानि च । सक्षीराणां च वृक्षाणां प्ररोहान्कुसुमानि च ।।
शुक्लानि चैव वस्त्राणि श्वेतं चैवानुलेपनम् । सुगन्धीनि च माल्यानि स्थलजान्यम्बुजानि च ।।
चन्दनानि च दिव्यानि गन्धांश्च विविधान्बहून् । अक्षतं जातरूपं च प्रियङ्गुमधुसर्पिषी ।।
दधिचर्म च वैयाघ्रं वाराही चाप्युपानहौ । समालम्भनमादाय रोचनां समनःशिलाम् । आजग्मुस्तत्र मुदिता वराः कन्यास्तु षोडश ।।
ततस्ते वानरश्रेष्ठं यथाकालं यथाविधि । रत्नैर्वस्त्रैश्च भक्ष्यैश्च तोषयित्वा द्विजर्षभान् ।।
data.es: Then they duly propitiated the brahmins, offering them gifts of gems, clothes and eatables.
data.anv: ततः then, रत्नैः with gems, वस्त्रैश्च and with clothes, भक्ष्यैः with eatables, द्विजर्षभान् brahmins, तोषयित्वा after satisfying them, ते they, यथाविधि duly, वानरश्रेष्ठम् best of monkeys.
data.md: Thereupon those monkeys pleased the foremost of twice-born ones with jewels clothes and eatables, with a view to install that best of monkeys.

data.v: ततः कुशपरिस्तीर्णं समिद्धं जातवेदसं । मन्त्रपूतेन हविषा हुत्वा मन्त्रविदो जनाः ।।
data.es: Then the priests (people who recite Vedic hymns) strew around kusa grass, kindled sacred fire with recitation of mantras and made offerings of havis into the fire.
data.anv: ततः then, मन्त्रविदः  who recite vedic hymns, जनाः people, कुशपरिस्तीर्णम् strewn with kusa grass, समिद्धम् kindled, जातवेदसम् fire, मन्त्रपूतेन by sanctifying with mantras, हविषा with havis, हुत्वा having offered,
data.md: And these conversant with mantras threw clarified butter, sanctified by mantras, into flaming fire burning on a Kusa bed.

data.v: ततो हेमप्रतिष्ठाने वरास्तरणसंवृते । प्रासादशिखरे रम्ये चित्रमाल्योपशोभिते ।।
प्राङ्मुखं विविधैर्मन्त्रैः स्थापयित्वा वरासने । नदीनदेभ्यः संहृत्य तीर्थेभ्यश्च समन्ततः ।।
आहृत्य च समुद्रेभ्यः सर्वेभ्यो वानरर्षभाः । अपः कनककुम्भेषु निधाय विमलाः शुभाः ।।
शुभैर्वृषभशृङ्गैश्च कलशैश्चापि काञ्चनैः । शास्त्रदृष्टेन विधिना महर्षिविहितेन च ।।
गजो गवाक्षो गवयः शरभो गन्धमादनः । मैन्दश्च द्विविदश्चैव हनूमाञ्जाम्बवान्नलः ।।
data.md: Gaja, and Gavākṣa, and Gavaya, and Sarabha, and Gandhamādana, and Mainda, and Dwivida, and Angada, and Jāmbavān.

data.v: अभ्यषिञ्चन्त सुग्रीवं प्रसन्नेन सुगन्धिना । सलिलेन सहस्राक्षं वसवो वासवं यथा ।।
अभिषिक्ते तु सुग्रीवे सर्वे वानरपुंगवाः । प्रचुक्रुशुर्महात्मानो हृष्टास्तत्र सहस्रशः ।।
data.es: As Sugriva was ceremoniously consecrated, thousands of monkeys rejoiced and shrieked out of joy.
data.anv: सुग्रीवे  as Sugriva, अभिषिक्ते was consecrated, सहस्रशः in thousands, सर्वे all, तत्र there, महात्मानः great, वानरपुङ्गवाः leaders among monkeys, हृष्टाः rejoiced, प्रचुक्रुशुः shrieked out of joy.

data.v: रामस्य तु वचः कुर्वन्सुग्रीवो हरिपुंगवः । अङ्गदं संपरिष्वज्य यौवराज्येऽभिषेचयत् ।।
data.es: In obedience to Rama's instruction, Sugriva, lord of the monkeys installed Angada as prince regent and embraced him.
data.anv: हरिपुङ्गवः lord of monkeys, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, रामस्य Rama's, वचः words, कुर्वन्  obeying, अङ्गदम् Angada, सम्परिष्वज्य embraced, यौवराज्ये prince regent, अभ्यषेचयत् consecrated.
data.md: Abiding by Rama's words, Sugriva, the lord of monkeys, embracing Angada conferred on him the heir-apparentship of the throne.

data.v: अङ्गदे चाभिषिक्ते तु सानुक्रोशाः प्लवंगमाः । साधु साध्विति सुग्रीवं महात्मानोऽभ्यपूजयन् ।।
data.es: The great monkeys concerned hailed Sugriva's action saying, 'well done, well done' on the installation of Angada.
data.anv: अङ्गदे च when Angada also, अभिषिक्ते तु on his consecration, सानुक्रोशाः those who were concerned, महात्मानः great souls, प्लवङ्गमाः monkeys, साधु साधु well done, well done, इति thus, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, अभ्यपूजयन् greeted with reverence.
data.md: Angada being thus installed, those best of monkeys, highly delighted adored the highsouled Sugrīva, extolling him again and again.

data.v: हृष्टपुष्टजनाकीर्णा पताकाध्वजशोभिता । बभूव नगरी रम्या क्षिकिन्धा गिरिगह्वरे ।।
data.es: The beautiful city of Kishkinda situated in a mountaincave, decorated with banners and flags was filled with happy, wellfed citizens.
data.anv: गिरिगह्वरे in the mountain cavern, पताकाध्वजशोभिता decorated with banners and flags, रम्या beautiful, किष्किन्धानगरी city of Kishkinda, हृष्टपुष्टजनाकीर्णा filled with happy welfare citizens, बभूव it looked.
data.md: The city of Kiskindhā, filled with stoutly built people and adorned with pennons and flags, appeared beautiful in the mountain cave.

data.v: निवेद्य रामाय तदा महात्मने; महाभिषेकं कपिवाहिनीपतिः । रुमां च भार्यां प्रतिलभ्य वीर्यवा;नवाप राज्यं त्रिदशाधिपो यथा ।।
data.md: Communicating to the high-souled Rāma the news of installation the highly powerful lord of monkey hosts (Sugrīva) getting back his wife Rumā, regained the kingdom like to the lord of celestials.

data.v: अभिषिक्ते तु सुग्रीवे प्रविष्टे वानरे गुहाम् । आजगाम सह भ्रात्रा रामः प्रस्रवणं गिरिम् ।।
data.es: After the consecration, Sugriva entered the cavecity (of Kishkinda) and Rama accompanied by his brother reached mountain Prasravana.
data.anv: अभिषिक्ते after consecration, वानरे the money, सुग्रीवे Sugriva, गुहाम् cave, प्रविष्टे entered, रामः Rama, भ्रात्रा सह accompanied by his brother, प्रस्रवणं गिरिम् Prasravana mountain, आजगाम arrived.

data.v: शार्दूलमृगसंघुष्टं सिंहैर्भीमरवैर्वृतम् । नानागुल्मलतागूढं बहुपादपसंकुलम् ।।
data.es: The (Prasravana) mountain reverberated with the terrific roars of tigers and deer and lions. There were several kinds of shrubs, creepers and trees.It was inhabited by bears, apes, monkeys and wild cats in large number. The mountain was like a huge cluster of clouds. The waters in the ponds were pure.
data.anv: शार्दूलमृगसङ्घुष्टम् filled with sounds of tigers and deer, भीमरवैः roaring in a terrific manner, सिंहैः with lions, वृतम् surrounded with, नानागुल्मलतागूढम् covered with different kinds of shrubs and creepers, बहुपादपसङ्कुलम् full of many kinds of trees, ऋक्षवानरगोपुच्छैः  bears, monkeys, and apes, मार्जारैश्च and wild cats, निषेवितम् inhabited, मेघराशिनिभम् like a huge cluster of clouds, नित्यम् always, शुचिजलाश्रमम् ponds of pure water, शैलम् mountain.

data.v: ऋक्षवानरगोपुच्छैर्मार्जारैश्च निषेवितम् । मेघराशिनिभं शैलं नित्यं शुचिजलाश्रयम् ।।
data.es: The (Prasravana) mountain reverberated with the terrific roars of tigers and deer and lions. There were several kinds of shrubs, creepers and trees.It was inhabited by bears, apes, monkeys and wild cats in large number. The mountain was like a huge cluster of clouds. The waters in the ponds were pure.
data.anv: शार्दूलमृगसङ्घुष्टम् filled with sounds of tigers and deer, भीमरवैः roaring in a terrific manner, सिंहैः with lions, वृतम् surrounded with, नानागुल्मलतागूढम् covered with different kinds of shrubs and creepers, बहुपादपसङ्कुलम् full of many kinds of trees, ऋक्षवानरगोपुच्छैः  bears, monkeys, and apes, मार्जारैश्च and wild cats, निषेवितम् inhabited, मेघराशिनिभम् like a huge cluster of clouds, नित्यम् always, शुचिजलाश्रमम् ponds of pure water, शैलम् mountain.

data.v: तस्य शैलस्य शिखरे महतीमायतां गुहाम् । प्रत्यगृह्णत वासार्थं रामः सौमित्रिणा सह ।।
data.es: Rama and Lakshmana decided to reside in the long, wide cave on top of the great mountain.
data.anv: रामः Rama, सौमित्रिणा सह with Saumitri, तस्य शैलस्य  mountain's, शिखरे on the top, महतीम् great long, आयताम् wide, गुहाम् cave, वासार्थम्  to reside, प्रत्यगृह्णत  decided to reside.
data.md: Rāma, along with Saumitri, selected for his habitation, a spacious cave, situated on the summit of that hill.

data.v: अवसत्तत्र धर्मात्मा राघवः सहलक्ष्मणः । बहुदृश्यदरीकुञ्जे तस्मिन्प्रस्रवणे गिरौ ।।
data.es: Having said so, Rama resided with Lakshmana on the Prasvarana mountain with many beautiful caverns and shrubs of vines.
data.anv: राघवः Rama, इति thus, उक्त्वा having said so, बहुदृश्यदरीकुञ्जे in a spot of many caverns and shrubs of vines, तस्मिन् that, प्रस्रवणे गिरौ Prasravana mountain, तत्र there, सहलक्ष्मण: along with Lakshmana, न्यवसत् he resided.
data.md: Having said this, Rāghava, along with Laks maņa, dwelt in that Prasravana hill abounding in caves and bowers.

data.v: सुसुखेऽपि बहुद्रव्ये तस्मिन्हि धरणीधरे । वसतस्तस्य रामस्य रतिरल्पापि नाभवत् । हृतां हि भार्यां स्मरतः प्राणेभ्योऽपि गरीयसीम् ।।
data.es: Though Rama was residing in comfort on the mountain richly endowed with many pleasant things, he experienced little happiness.
data.anv: सुसुखे in comfort, बहुद्रव्ये richly endowed, तस्मिन् in that, धरणीधरे on that mountain, वसतः while residing, तस्य रामस्य for that Rama's, अल्पापि even a little, रतिः pleasure, नाभवत् was not experienced.
data.md: He did not attain to a best felicity although he lived in that pleasant hill filled with many things.

data.v: उदयाभ्युदितं दृष्ट्वा शशाङ्कं च विशेषतः । आविवेश न तं निद्रा निशासु शयनं गतम् ।।
data.md: Pondering over the ravishment of his spouse, dearer than his life, beholding the setting of the Sun in particular, he did not go to sleep, although he laid himself on the bed in the night.

data.v: तत्समुत्थेन शोकेन बाष्पोपहतचेतसं । तं शोचमानं काकुत्स्थं नित्यं शोकपरायणम् । तुल्यदुःखोऽब्रवीद्भ्राता लक्ष्मणोऽनुनयन्वचः ।।
data.es: Seeing Rama worried and engrossed in endless sorrow, his brother Lakshmana who was equally sad spoke these words of consolation:
data.anv: शोचमानम् who was worried, नित्यम् perpetually, शोकपरायणम्  engrossed in sorrow, तम् him, काकुत्स्थम् Kakutstha (Rama), अनुनयन् consoling, तुल्यदुःखः an equally sad man, भ्राता brother, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, वचः words, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: His younger brother Laksmana, equally aggrieved, spoke to Kākutstha, thus bewailing being exercised with grief and almost beside himself with sorrow, consequent upon Sita's bereavement, saying.

data.v: अलं वीर व्यथां गत्वा न त्वं शोचितुमर्हसि । शोचतो ह्यवसीदन्ति सर्वार्था विदितं हि ते ।।
data.es: 'O heroic one, you know one who broods fails to achieve his objective. So do not brood.
data.anv: वीर O hero, व्यथाम् pain, गत्वा अलम् stop it, त्वम् you, शोचितुम् to worry, न अर्हसि you do not deserve, शोचतः by grieving, सर्वार्थाः all objects, व्यवसीदन्ति हि sink, ते to you, विदितं हि you are aware of this.
data.md: It does not behove you to lament thus, being exercised with grief—it is not unknown to you that people, thus bewailing do exhaust themselves by and by.

data.v: भवान्क्रियापरो लोके भवान्देवपरायणः । आस्तिको धर्मशीलश्च व्यवसायी च राघव ।।
data.es: 'O Rama you are a man of action, enterprising. You are godfearing, righteous and religious. You will not be able to kill a crooked enemy in a battle, especially a demon, with your valour if you make no endeavour.
data.anv: अव्यवसितः a man of no enterprise, त्वम् you, विक्रमैः with valiant advances, जिह्मकारिणम्  crooked, शत्रुम् enemy, विशेषतः specially, राक्षसम् demon, तम् him, रणे in war, हन्तुम् to slay, समर्थः न हि will not have the capacity, भवान् you, लोके in this world, कियापर a man of action, भवान् you, देवपरायणः devoted to gods, आस्तिक  faithful , धर्मशील:च  righteous also, व्यवसायी च also enterprising,राघव O Rama.
data.md: O Rāghava, you are devoted to pious actions and the services of the Deity in this world-and pious, energetic and did believe in the existence of God.

data.v: न ह्यव्यवसितः शत्रुं राक्षसं तं विशेषतः । समर्थस्त्वं रणे हन्तुं विक्रमैर्जिह्मकारिणम् ।।
data.es: 'O Rama you are a man of action, enterprising. You are godfearing, righteous and religious. You will not be able to kill a crooked enemy in a battle, especially a demon, with your valour if you make no endeavour.
data.anv: अव्यवसितः a man of no enterprise, त्वम् you, विक्रमैः with valiant advances, जिह्मकारिणम्  crooked, शत्रुम् enemy, विशेषतः specially, राक्षसम् demon, तम् him, रणे in war, हन्तुम् to slay, समर्थः न हि will not have the capacity, भवान् you, लोके in this world, कियापर a man of action, भवान् you, देवपरायणः devoted to gods, आस्तिक  faithful , धर्मशील:च  righteous also, व्यवसायी च also enterprising,राघव O Rama.
data.md: Without being persevering you shall not be able to destroy in conflict your enemy—that terrible, wily Rākşasa.

data.v: समुन्मूलय शोकं त्वं व्यवसायं स्थिरं कुरु । ततः सपरिवारं तं निर्मूलं कुरु राक्षसं ।।
data.es: 'Root out sorrow. Be daring. Be firm in resolve. (Only) then can you destroy the demon and his family.
data.anv: त्वम् you, शोकम् sorrow, समुन्मूलय  may uproot, व्यवसायम् daring, स्थिरं कुरु be firm in resolve, ततः then, सपरिवारम् along with all relatives, तं निर्मूलं  him destroy, कुरु you do, राक्षसम् that demon.
data.md: Do you renounce your grief and take recourse to energy and you shall be able to slay that Rākş asa with all his family.

data.v: पृथिवीमपि काकुत्स्थ ससागरवनाचलाम् । परिवर्तयितुं शक्तः किमङ्ग पुन रावणम् ।।
data.es: 'O Kakutstha, you can turn the earth with its oceans, forests and mountains, what to speak of Ravana.
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ O Kakutstha, ससागरवनाचलाम् with oceans, forests and mountains, पृथिवीमपि the entire earth, परिवर्तयितुम् can turn, शक्तः able, रावणम् that  Ravana, किं पुनः what more?
data.md: What of the destruction of Rāvana, you are O Kākutstha. capable of uprooting the earth with oceans, forest and hills.

data.v: अहं तु खलु ते वीर्यं प्रसुप्तं प्रतिबोधये । दीप्तैराहुतिभिः काले भस्मच्छन्नमिवानलम् ।।
data.es: 'I am only awakening your dormant valour as one would kindle the fire covered with ashes by making offerings.'
data.anv: अहम् I am, काले in proper time, दीप्सैः with smouldering fire, आहुतिभिः with offerings, भस्मच्छन्नम् covered with ashes, अनलम् इव like fire, ते your, प्रसुप्तम् dormant, वीर्यम् courage, प्रतिबोधये खलु I am awakening.
data.md: I, too, am exciting your latent energy like to fire hidden in ashes with oblations.

data.v: लक्ष्मणस्य तु तद्वाक्यं प्रतिपूज्य हितं शुभम् । राघवः सुहृदं स्निग्धमिदं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: On hearing the good counsel and auspicious words of Lakshmana, Rama spoke these loving and warm words:
data.anv: राघवः Rama, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, हितम् good counsel, शुभम् auspicious, तत् वाक्यम् those words, प्रतिपूज्य respecting, सुहृदम् warm hearted, स्निग्धं loving, इदं वचनम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
data.md: Welcoming the auspicious and well-meaning accents of Lakşmaņa, Raghava again spoke to him the following affectionate words. when you

data.v: वाच्यं यदनुरक्तेन स्निग्धेन च हितेन च । सत्यविक्रम युक्तेन तदुक्तं लक्ष्मण त्वया ।।
data.es: 'O Sugriva you have done what a friend should have done in a befitting manner with your sweet words and good wishes.
data.anv: सुग्रीव O Sugriva, स्निग्धेन by a loving, हितेन च and by a wellwisher, वयस्येन by a friend, यत् whatever, कर्तव्यं duty, अनुरूपं suitable, युक्तम् proper, तत् that, त्वया by you, कृतम् done
data.md: O Lakşmaņa, truly do your words become you, affectionate, devoted, truthful and intent in my welfare as you are.

data.v: एष शोकः परित्यक्तः सर्वकार्यावसादकः । विक्रमेष्वप्रतिहतं तेजः प्रोत्साहयाम्यहम् ।।
data.es: 'This sorrow which dampens one's daring spirit is given up. I shall now resort to such undaunted valour during my heroic exploits.
data.anv: सर्वकार्यावसादकः which can destroy all work, एषःthis, शोकः sorrow, परित्यक्तः is given up, अहम् I, विक्रमेषु during heroic exploits, अप्रतिहतम् unaffected, तेजः vigour प्रोत्सहयामि  I will resort to
data.md: Renouncing this grief standing in the way of all business, I shail call forth, the more, this my energy on the occasion of displaying my prowess.

data.v: शरत्कालं प्रतीक्षेऽहमियं प्रावृडुपस्थिता । ततः सराष्ट्रं सगणं राक्षसं तं निहन्म्यहम् ।।
data.es: 'This is the rainy season.Wait for autumn.Thereafter you will destroy Ravana along with his kingdom and clan.
data.anv: अयम् this, प्रावृट्कालः rainy season, आगतः has set in, शरत्कालम् autumn, प्रतीक्षस्व you may wait for, ततः then, सराष्ट्रम् along with his country, सगणम् along with his troops, त्वं you, रावणम्  Ravana, वधिष्यसि will slay.
data.md: Rains have set in and do you wait for the autumn shall encompass the destruction of Rāvana with his kingdom and kinsmen.

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा हृष्टो रामस्य लक्ष्मणः । पुनरेवाब्रवीद्वाक्यं सौमित्रिर्मित्रनन्दनः ।।
data.es: 'Dundubhi whose eyes turned red in anger when he heard the words of Vali ,the wise king of the monkeys, said:
data.anv: दुन्दुभिः Dundubhi, धीमतः of the wise one, तस्य गिरिराजस्य of that king of mountains, तत् that, वचनम् word, श्रुत्वा after hearing, क्रोधात् angrily, संरक्तलोचनः with eyes turned red, वाक्यम् these words, उवाच said.

data.v: एतत्ते सदृशं वाक्यमुक्तं शत्रुनिबर्हण । इदानीमसि काकुत्स्थ प्रकृतिं स्वामुपागतः ।।
विज्ञाय ह्यात्मनो वीर्यं तथ्यं भवितुमर्हसि । एतत्सदृशमुक्तं ते श्रुतस्याभिजनस्य च ।।
तस्मात्पुरुषशार्दूल चिन्तयञ्शत्रुनिग्रहम् । वर्षारात्रमनुप्राप्तमतिक्रामय राघव ।।
नियम्य कोपं प्रतिपाल्यतां शर;त्क्षमस्व मासांश्चतुरो मया सह । वसाचलेऽस्मिन्मृगराजसेविते; संवर्धयञ्शत्रुवधे समुद्यतः ।।
data.es: 'Control your anger and wait for autumn. Pardon these (intervening) four months (which put a halt on your wareffort). Stay with me on this mountain infested with lions. Brace up to kill the enemy.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये किष्किन्धाकाण्डे सप्तविंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentyseventh sarga of Kishkindakanda of the Holy Ramayana, the first epic, composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: शत्रुवधे in slaying of enemies, समुद्यमम् effort, क्षमस्व you may pardon, कोपम् anger, नियम्य controlling, शरत् autumn, प्रतिपाल्यताम् you may wait for, चतुरः four, मासान् months, संवर्तयन्  carrying out, मृगराजसेविते inhabited by lions, अस्मिन् अचले on this mountain, मया सह along with me, वस stay.
data.md: Subduing your wrath, and awaiting the autumn, do you with me spend these four months in this hill filled with deer, capable as you are of encompassing the destruction of your enemy.

data.v: स तदा वालिनं हत्वाह्सुग्रीवमभिषिच्य च । वसन्माल्यवतः पृष्टे रामो लक्ष्मणमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: After the killing of Vali and installation of Sugriva as king, Rama arrived at mountain Malyavan to reside.He said to Lakshmana:
data.anv: वालिनम् Vali, हत्वा killed, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, अभिषिच्य installed, तदा then, माल्यवतः mountain Malyavan, पृष्ठे on, वसन् reside, सः रामः Rama, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, अब्रवीत् spoke.
data.md: Thereupon encompassing the destruction of Vāli, installing Sugrīva and dwelling on the summit of the Mālyabana hill, Rāma spoke to Laksmana, saying,

data.v: अयं स कालः संप्राप्तः समयोऽद्य जलागमः । संपश्य त्वं नभो मेघैः संवृतं गिरिसंनिभैः ।।
data.es: 'Now that the rainy season has started, see the sky covered with mountainlike (huge) clouds.
data.anv: सः अयम् this, कालः time, सम्प्राप्तः started, अद्य now, जलागमः समयः time of rainy season, गिरिसन्निभैः like mountains, मेघैः by clouds, संवृतम् covered, नभः sky, त्वम् you, सम्पश्य  see.
data.md: This is the time the beginning of the rainy season-do you behold the sky enveloped with clouds resembling so many hills.

data.v: नव मास धृतं गर्भं भास्कारस्य गभस्तिभिः । पीत्वा रसं समुद्राणां द्यौः प्रसूते रसायनम् ।।
data.es: 'The sky has drained the water from the oceans through the Sun's rays and has borne it for nine months (from Kartika to Asarha) in its womb. It delivers water which is the base for all juices.
data.anv: द्यौः sky, भास्करस्य Sun's, गभस्तिभिः with rays of sunlight, समुद्राणाम् from oceans, रसम् water, पीत्वा drunk, नवमासधृतम् borne for nine months, रसायनम् the base for all juices, गर्भम् womb, प्रसूते is delivering.
data.md: The sky, drinking the liquid contents of the ocean through the rays of the Sun, and being enceinite for nine months, is giving birth to showers.

data.v: शक्यमम्बरमारुह्य मेघसोपानपङ्क्तिभिः । कुटजार्जुनमालाभिरलंकर्तुं दिवाकरम् ।।
data.es: 'It is possible to climb up to the sky on the stairs formed by the clouds and decorate the Sungod with garlands made of kutaja and arjuna flowers.
data.anv: मेघसोपानपङ्क्तिभिः by the stairway of clouds, अम्बरम् sky, आरुह्य climbing, दिवाकरम् Sun, कुटजार्जुनमालाभिः with garlands of kutaja and arjuna flowers, अलङ्कर्तुम् to decorate, शक्यम् is possible.
data.md: Ascending the sky by the steps of clouds, one can ornameni the Sun with garlands of Kutajas and Arjunas.

data.v: संध्यारागोत्थितैस्ताम्रैरन्तेष्वधिकपाण्डुरैः । स्निग्धैरभ्रपटच्छदैर्बद्धव्रणमिवाम्बरम् ।।
data.es: 'The sky looks as though its wounds are dressed with pale white moistureladen bandage cloths of clouds, red in the border, tinged as they are with the glow of twilight.
data.anv: सन्ध्यारागोत्थितैः owing to the touch of the radiance of the evening Sun, ताम्रैः with red colour, अन्तेष्वधिक in the tinge, पाण्डुरैः with pale white colour, स्निग्धैः shining, अभ्रपटच्छेदैः pieces of cloth of clouds, अम्बरम् sky, बद्धव्रणम् इव appears like a bandaged wound.
data.md: Like to a wound covered with a torn cloth, the sky is enveloped with cool clouds, coppery with the rays of the setting Sun, and yellow at another end.

data.v: मन्दमारुतनिःश्वासं संध्याचन्दनरञ्जितम् । आपाण्डुजलदं भाति कामातुरमिवाम्बरम् ।।
data.es: 'The sky with its gentle winds as its sighs, its ash coloured clouds (suggestive of a pale face) painted with red sandalpaste in the form of glow of twilight appears like a passionate lover.
data.anv: मन्दमारुतनिश्वासम् sighing with gentle winds, सन्ध्याचन्दनरञ्जितम् reddened with sandalpaste of evening twilight, आपाण्डुजलदम् with ashcoloured clouds, अम्बरम् sky, भाति appears, कामातुरं passionate lover.
data.md: The sky, having mild breezes as its breath, sprinkled with sandal-like evening rays and covered with yellow clouds, is appearing as it were like one stricken with amour.

data.v: एषा धर्मपरिक्लिष्टा नववारिपरिप्लुता । सीतेव शोकसंतप्ता मही बाष्पं विमुञ्चति ।।
data.es: 'This earth scorched by the heat and then flooded with fresh rain water, radiating heat, appears like my Sita shedding tears burning with grief.
data.anv: घर्मपरिक्लिष्टा scorched by the heat, नववारिपरिप्लुता flooded with fresh rain water, एषा मही the earth that way, शोकसन्तप्ता burning with grief, सीतेव like Sita, बाष्पम् tears, विमुञ्चति is shedding.
data.md: The earth, afflicted with perspiration and filled with new water, is emitting forth vapour like to Sitā racked with sorrow.

data.v: मेघोदरविनिर्मुक्ताः कह्लारसुखशीतलाः । शक्यमञ्जलिभिः पातुं वाताः केतकिगन्धिनः ।।
data.es: 'The winds released from the wombs of clouds, cool as the delicate touch of white lotuses,charged with the fragrance of ketaka flowers can be inhaled through the hollow of one's palms.
data.anv: मेघोदरविनिर्मुक्ताः released from the womb of clouds, कह्लारसुखशीतलाः gentle and cool as white lotuses, केतकिगन्धिनः carrying the fragrance of Kethaka flowers, वाताः winds, अञ्जलिभिः with cupped palms also, पातुम् for drinking, शक्यम् possible.
data.md: Ketaka smelling breezes may be drunk up in the cavity formed by putting the hands together, like to cold water discharged off the clouds and mixed with camphor.

data.v: एष फुल्लार्जुनः शैलः केतकैरधिवासितः । सुग्रीव इव शान्तारिर्धाराभिरभिषिच्यते ।।
data.es: 'This mountain scented by the fragrance of arjuna and ketaka flowers is bathed in rain water just as Sugriva, tranquilled by the destruction of the enemy is consecrated in streams of (sacred) waters.
data.anv: फुल्लार्जुनः arjuna flowers, केतकैः ketaka flowers, अधिवासितः filled with fragrance, एषः शैलः this mountain that way, शान्तारिः tranquilled by the destruction of enemy, सुग्रीव इव like Sugriva, धाराभिः with flowing water, अभिषिच्यते is consecrated.
data.md: This hill, having blown Arjunas and Ketakas and rid of its enemies like to Sugriva, has been bathed with showers.

data.v: मेघकृष्णाजिनधरा धारायज्ञोपवीतिनः । मारुतापूरितगुहाः प्राधीता इव पर्वताः ।।
data.es: 'The mountains are covered with dark clouds which appear like the hide of the antelope. Streams of rain water flowing are like the sacred threads hanging down the shoulder and the sounds of wind filling the caves resemble the recitation of Vedas by priests. (These mountains are comparable to the brahmacharins engaged in the recitation of Vedas wearing antelopeskin and sacred threads).
data.anv: मेघकृष्णाजिनधराः clouds of the colour of black antelope skin, धारायज्ञोपवीतिनः streams of water falling like sacred threads, मारुतापूरितगुहाः winds in caves, पर्वताः mountain, प्राधीता इव like priests reciting (mantras).
data.md: These hillocks, having clouds for dark deerskins, heavy showers for sacred threads and having caves filled with air, are appearing like so many Brahmins who have finished their studies.

data.v: कशाभिरिव हैमीभिर्विद्युद्भिरिव ताडितम् । अन्तःस्तनितनिर्घोषं सवेदनमिवाम्बरम् ।।
data.es: 'The sky lashed with lightnings with whips of gold and emitting groans in the form of peals of thunder, appears as though crying in severe pain.
data.anv: हैमीभिः by the golden, कशाभिरिव whips, विद्युद्भि: by the lightnings, ताडितम् lashed, स्तनित thunder, निर्घोषम् sounds, अम्बरम् sky, अन्तः inside, सवेदनमिव as if crying in severe pain.
data.md: The sky, being struck by thunders like to so many golden lashes, is, as if, groaning under a deep mental agony.

data.v: नीलमेघाश्रिता विद्युत्स्फुरन्ती प्रतिभाति मे । स्फुरन्ती रावणस्याङ्के वैदेहीव तपस्विनी ।।
data.es: 'The triggering of lightning in the dark clouds appears to me like austere Vaidehi struggling helplessly to get free from the lap of Ravana.
data.anv: नीलमेघाश्रिता coverd with dark clouds, स्फुरन्ती triggering looks like, विद्युत् lightning, रावणस्य Ravana's, अङ्के from the lap, स्फुरन्ती struggling, तपस्विनी pitiable woman, वैदेहीव like Vaidehi, मा to me, प्रतिभाति appears.
data.md: Methinks, the lighting, shining by the violet clouds, is appearing like to the poor Vaidehi at the lap of Rävaņa.

data.v: इमास्ता मन्मथवतां हिताः प्रतिहता दिशः । अनुलिप्ता इव घनैर्नष्टग्रहनिशाकराः ।।
data.es: 'Smeared as it were with dense clouds and therefore blocked the directions in which planets including the Moon cease to appear are favourable to lovers. The Moon is said to accenuate the pangs of separation from one's ladylove. Hence the quarters in which the Moon and the stars are hidden by clouds, have been favourable to the lovelorn.
data.anv: मन्मथवताम् for the lovers, हिताः favourable, प्रतिहताः blocked, नष्टग्रहनिशाकराः Moon or planets seized to appear, इमाः this, ताः दिशः directions, घनैः with dense clouds, अनुलिप्ता इव as if smeared.
data.md: These quarters, enveloped with clouds and having therefore the Moon and stars hidden, are indeed very pleasant to those who are under the influence of Cupid

data.v: क्वचिद्बाष्पाभिसंरुद्धान्वर्षागमसमुत्सुकान् । कुटजान्पश्य सौमित्रे पुष्टितान्गिरिसानुषु । मम शोकाभिभूतस्य कामसंदीपनान्स्थितान् ।।
data.es: 'O Saumitri look at the kutaja flowers standing on the mountain slopes withered by the heat. They welcome the fresh showers of rain and rekindle passion in me even though my heart is overwhelmed with grief.
data.anv: सौमित्रे O Saumitri, क्वचित् at some places, बाष्पाभिसंरुद्धान् withered in the heat of water vapour, वर्षागमसमुत्सुकान् welcome the fresh showers of rain, गिरिसानुषु on slop of mountains,  स्थितान् standing, पुष्पितान् bloomed, शोकाभिभूतस्य overwhelmed with grief, मम my, कामसन्दीपनान् kindling my love, कुटजान् kutaja trees, पश्य see.
data.md: Behold, O Saumitri, on the summits of the hill the flowery Kuțajas enveloped with the vapour arising out of the earth, gladdened at the approach of the rainy season and exciting my amour who am stricken with grief.

data.v: रजः प्रशान्तं सहिमोऽद्य वायु;र्निदाघदोषप्रसराः प्रशान्ताः । स्थिता हि यात्रा वसुधाधिपानां; प्रवासिनो यान्ति नराः स्वदेशान् ।।
data.es: 'Now the dust has settled and the wind carrying mist is cool. The torments of summer have ceased. The expeditions of kings have come to a stop and the travellers return to their native land.
data.anv: अद्य now, रजः dust, प्रशान्तम् has settled, वायुः wind, सहिमः blowing with mist, निदाघदोषप्रसराः  torments of the heat of summer, प्रशान्ताः pacified, वसुधाधिपानाम् lords of earth, यात्रा expeditions, स्थिता हि is stopped, प्रवासिनः the travellers far off, नराः men, स्वदेशान् to their own land, यान्ति reach.
data.md: (In this season) the dust is watered, the air is saturated with dews, all the evils of the summer are stopped, the kings no longer proceed on royal marches and those journeying in a foreign land return their native homes.

data.v: संप्रस्थिता मानसवासलुब्धाः; प्रियान्विताः संप्रति चक्रवाकः । अभीक्ष्णवर्षोदकविक्षतेषु; यानानि मार्गेषु न संपतन्ति ।।
data.es: 'Desirous of living in Manasa lake swans have set out on their journey and the chakravaka birds are now united with their mates. The carts move not on the roads damaged by heavy rains.
data.anv: सम्प्रति presently, मानसवासलुब्धाः desiring to live in Manasa lake, सम्प्रस्थिताः  started their journey, चक्रवाकाः the chakravakas, प्रियान्विताः united with their loved ones, अभीक्ष्णवर्षोदकविक्षतेषु damaged by heavy rains, मार्गेषु on the roads, यानानि carts, न सम्पतन्ति not move out.
data.md: The Cakravākas along with their mates are proceeding, being desirous to live in the Mänasa Sarovara, and in consequence of incessant rains, chariots and other conveyances cannot pass along the wayfares.

data.v: क्वचित्प्रकाशं क्वचिदप्रकाशं; नभः प्रकीर्णाम्बुधरं विभाति । क्वचित्क्वचित्पर्वतसंनिरुद्धं; रूपं यथा शान्तमहार्णवस्य ।।
data.es: 'The sky which is visible here is not visible there due to clouds scattered. It looks bright (blue) here and dull there. It appears like an unruffled ocean interspersed with hills here and there.
data.anv: प्रकीर्णाम्बुधरम्  clouds scattered all over the sky, क्वचित् in some place, प्रकाशम् flashing, क्वचित् at some other place, अप्रकाशम् dull, नभः the sky, क्वचित्क्वचित् here and there, पर्वतसन्निरुद्धम् obstructed by mountains, शान्तमहार्णवस्य like unruffled ocean, रूपं यथा appearing like that, विभाति glowing
data.md: Somewhere hidden, somewhere open, the sky, covered with clouds, appears like a vast ocean, being encircled here and there with hills.

data.v: व्यामिश्रितं सर्जकदम्बपुष्पै;र्नवं जलं पर्वतधातुताम्रम् । मयूरकेकाभिरनुप्रयातं; शैलापगाः शीघ्रतरं वहन्ति ।।
data.es: 'The mountainstreams of rainwater mingled with sarja and kadamba flowers carry fresh water swiftly to the ocean along with the deposits of red mineral rocks of the mountain. Hark, the peacock cries.
data.anv: शैलापगाः streams of water from the mountains, सार्जकदम्बपुष्पैः with sarja and kadamba blossoms, व्यामिश्रितम् combined with, पर्वतधातुताम्रम् red with minerals of the mountain, मयूरकेकाभिः cries of peacocks, अनुप्रयातम् accompany, नवं जलम्   fresh rain water, शीघ्रतरम् swiftly, वहन्ति flow.
data.md: There speedily pass by the hill streams, being resounded with the cries of peacocks, carrying with the current Sarja and Kadamba flowers and having their coppery contents mixed with the metals of the mountain.

data.v: रसाकुलं षट्पदसंनिकाशं; प्रभुज्यते जम्बुफलं प्रकामम् । अनेकवर्णं पवनावधूतं; भूमौ पतत्याम्रफलं विपक्वम् ।।
data.es: 'The black bees like jambu fruits full of sweet juice. People share them to their hearts content, while the mango fruits which take multiple colours on getting ripened drop on the ground shaken by the wind.
data.anv: रसाकुलम् very juicy, षट्पदसन्निकाशम् like the black bee, जम्बुफलम् jambu fruit, प्रकामम् to the heart's content, प्रभुज्यते are eaten, अनेकवर्णम् of multiple colours, विपक्वम् fully ripened, आम्रफलम् mango fruit, पवनावधूतम् shaken by the wind, भूमौ on the ground, पतति fall.
data.md: People (in this season) live upon Inany a sweet rose-apple; and ripe mangoes, of diverse colours, being shaken by the wind, fall on the earth.

data.v: विद्युत्पताकाः सबलाक मालाः; शैलेन्द्रकूटाकृतिसंनिकाशाः । गर्जन्ति मेघाः समुदीर्णनादा; मत्तगजेन्द्रा इव संयुगस्थः ।।
data.es: The clouds that resemble high mountain peaks, having their banners of lightning with rows of herons as garlands give out loud peals of thunder like elephants in rut trumpet in battlearray.
data.anv: विद्युत्पताकाः with banners of lightning, सबलाकमालाः closely connected garlands (rows) of herons, शैलेन्द्रकूटाकृतिसन्निकाशाः resembling the shapes of high mountain peaks, मेघाः clouds, संयुगस्थाः marching in wars, मत्ताः proud, गजेन्द्रा इव resembling elephants, समुदीर्णनादाः trumpetting in excitement, गर्जन्ति rumble.
data.md: The clouds, resembling the summits of a mountain, having lightnings for pennons and cranes for garlands, are muttering like to infuriated elephants in a field of battle.

data.v: मेघाभिकामी परिसंपतन्ती; संमोदिता भाति बलाकपङ्क्तिः । वातावधूता वरपौण्डरीकी; लम्बेव माला रचिताम्बरस्य ।।
data.es: 'The happy rows of herons flying in the sky to meet the clouds, appear like a long garland of choice white lotuses strung together hanging in the sky.
data.anv: मेघाभिकामा longing for clouds, परिसम्पतन्ती flying along, सम्मोदिता  rejoiced, बलाकपङ्क्ति: row of cranes, अम्बरस्य in the sky, वातावधूता shaken by the wind, वरपौण्डरीकी of the choice white lotuses, रचिता strung, लम्बा hanging, माला इव resemling garlands, भाति appears.
data.md: And rows of cranes, fond of clouds, rising up in the sky, delighted and moved by the wind, are appearing like a garland of white lotuses, spread along the welkin.

data.v: निद्रा शनैः केशवमभ्युपैति; द्रुतं नदी सागरमभ्युपैति । हृष्टा बलाका घनमभ्युपैति; कान्ता सकामा प्रियमभ्युपैति ।।
data.es: 'Sleep steals over Lord Visnu. The rivers run swiftly to the sea, the female herons fly to catch the clouds joyfully. The young bride eagerly approaches her dear lord. (It is believed that Lord Visnu goes to sleep during chaturmasya, ie. from Asarh to Kartik)
data.anv: निद्रा sleep, शनैः slowly, केशवम् Lord Visnu, अभ्युपैति steals over, नदी river, द्रुतम् swiftly, सागरम् sea, अभ्युपैति approaches, हृष्टा joyfully, बलाका crane, घनम् cloud, अभ्युपैति approaches, सकामा filled with passion, कान्ता woman, प्रियम् beloved, अभ्युपैति approaches.
data.md: (In this part of the year) sleep is gradually overcoming the great God Nārāyaṇa, the river is flowing speedily towards the ocean, the delighted cranes are approaching the clouds and the damsels are proceeding towards their lovers.

data.v: जाता वनान्ताः शिखिसुप्रनृत्ता; जाताः कदम्बाः सकदम्बशाखाः । जाता वृषा गोषु समानकामा; जाता मही सस्यवनाभिरामा ।।
data.es: 'Peacocks dance in the forest. The branches of the kadamba trees get filled with flowers. Bulls long for union with the cows. The earth looks beautiful with green crops and trees.
data.anv: वनान्ताः the forest regions, शिखिसम्प्रनृत्ताः peacocks dancing, जाताः have started, कदम्बाः kadamba trees, सकदम्बशाखाः branches of kadamba trees, जाताः started bloomimg, वृषाः mighty bulls, गोषु with cows, समानकामाः equally desiring, जाताः have become, मही earth, सस्यवनाभिरामा filled with lovely green crops and trees.
data.md: The peacocks are dancing at the forest skirts, the Kadamba trees are covered with flowers, the bulls have become attached to her and the earth has become charming with corns and forests.

data.v: वहन्ति वर्षन्ति नदन्ति भान्ति; ध्यायन्ति नृत्यन्ति समाश्वसन्ति । नद्यो घना मत्तगजा वनान्ताः; प्रियाविनीहाः शिखिनः प्लवंगाः ।।
data.es: 'The clouds are raining. The rivers are flowing. Proud elephants are trumpeting. Those separated from their loved ones are brooding. The monkeys are quiet and the peacocks are dancing.
data.anv: नद्यः rivers, घनाः clouds, मत्तगजाः proud elephants, वनान्ताः forest lands, प्रियाविहीनाः away from their loved ones, शिखिनः peacocks, प्लवङ्गमाः monkeys, वहन्ति are flowing, वर्षन्ति are raining, नदन्ति are trumpeting, भान्ति are shining, ध्यायन्ति contemplating, नृत्यन्ति dancing, समाश्वसन्ति are quietened.
data.md: The rivers are flowing by; the clouds are discharging waters; the infuriated elephants are emitting terrible roars; the forest-lands are growing more charming; persons, separated from their wives, are growing more anxious; the peacocks are dancing with delight and the monkeys are greatly comforted for Sugrīva's attaining to the kingdom.

data.v: प्रहर्षिताः केतकपुष्पगन्ध;माघ्राय हृष्टा वननिर्झरेषु । प्रपात शब्दाकुलिता गजेन्द्राः; सार्धं मयूरैः समदा नदन्ति ।।
data.es: 'The lordly elephants get intoxicated with the fragrance of ketaki flowers, the noise of waterfalls and the cackle of peacocks and they give out a shrill trumpet.
data.anv: केतकपुष्पगन्धम् fragrance of Ketaki flowers, आघ्राय enjoying the smell, प्रहर्षिताः joyously, गजेन्द्राः elephants, मत्ताः lordly, वननिर्झरेषु in the waterfalls, प्रपातशब्दाः disturbed by the sound of water falling, समदाः intoxicated ones, मयूरैः सार्धम् with peacocks,नदन्ति trumpet.
data.md: By the fountains in he forests, the infuriated elephants delighted with the fragrance of the Ketaka flowers and maddened with the noise of the water falls, are emitting terrible roars along with the peacocks.

data.v: धारानिपातैरभिहन्यमानाः; कदम्बशाखासु विलम्बमानाः । क्षणार्जितं पुष्परसावगाढं; शनैर्मदं षट्चरणास्त्यजन्ति ।।
data.es: 'Having sucked honey from the flowercups filled with honey, the bees are shedding their drunkenness slowly and hanging on the branches of kadamba trees, smitten with showers.
data.anv: धारानिपातैः with the flow of rainwater, अभिहन्यमानाः beaten, कदम्बशाखासु on the branches of kadamba trees, विलम्बमानाः hanging over, षट्चरणाः bees, क्षणार्जितम् acquired in a moment, पुष्परसावगाढम् sucking the honey from the flowers, मदम् strong smell, शनैः slowly, त्यजन्ति leave.
data.md: The black bees, resorting to the branches of the Kadamba trees and overwhelmed with showers, are, as if, slowly discharging their temporal juice-namely the honey of flowers collected by them ere while.

data.v: अङ्गारचूर्णोत्करसंनिकाशैः; फलैः सुपर्याप्त रसैः समृद्धैः । जम्बूद्रुमाणां प्रविभान्ति शाखा; निलीयमाना इव षट्पदौघैः ।।
data.es: 'The branches of jambu trees profusely filled with fruits appear like piled up balls of charcoal, while swarms of bees rest on the branches on the jambu trees.
data.anv: अङ्गारचूर्णोत्करसन्निकाशैः appearing like piled up balls of charcoal, फलैस्सुपर्याप्तरसै: filled with abundance of juice, समृद्धैः rich, जम्बूद्रुमाणां of jambu trees, प्रविभान्ति shining, शाखा: branches, निलीयमाना इव reclining,षट्पदौघैः by swarm of bees.
data.md: The branches of rose-apple trees containing enough of fruits like to a collection of char coal are so appearing as if the black bees are drinking the juice thereof.

data.v: तडित्पताकाभिरलंकृताना;मुदीर्णगम्भीरमहारवाणाम् । विभान्ति रूपाणि बलाहकानां; रणोद्यतानामिव वारणानाम् ।।
data.es: 'The rainclouds decorated with banners of lightning and giving out peals of thunder shine like elephants in rut trumpeting, eager to fight in battle.
data.anv: तटित्पताकाभिः banners of lightning, अलङ्कृतानाम् of the decorated, उदीर्णगम्भीरमहारवाणाम् making loud sound, वलाहकानाम् of the thundering clouds, रूपाणि forms, रणोत्सुकानाम् ready to fight in battle, वानराणाम् इव like elephants in rut, विभान्ति shine.
data.md: The dense clouds, ornamented with pennonlike lightnings and emitting terrible roars, are appearing like so many elephants, mad after fighting.

data.v: मार्गानुगः शैलवनानुसारी; संप्रस्थितो मेघरवं निशम्य । युद्धाभिकामः प्रतिनागशङ्की; मत्तो गजेन्द्रः प्रतिसंनिवृत्तः ।।
data.es: 'Intoxicated elephants on their march along the mountain in the forest, hear the thundering sounds of clouds and suspecting it to be the call of proud elephants to fight turn back.
data.anv: मेघरवम् thunder of clouds, निशम्य heard, प्रतिनादशङ्की suspected it to be the sound of the enemy, युद्धाभिकामः desirous of waging war, सम्प्रस्थितः started to go, मार्गानुगः following the way, शैलवनानुसारी following the trees of the forest along the mountain, मत्तः proud, गजेन्द्रः elephant, प्रतिसन्निवृत्तः turned back.
data.md: The infuriated lord of elephants, following in the track and ranging in the hills and forests hearing the muttering of clouds and taking it for the uproar of another elephant, has turned back, with a view to enter into conflict with him.

data.v: मुक्तासकाशं सलिलं पतद्वै; सुनिर्मलं पत्रपुटेषु लग्नम् । हृष्टा विवर्णच्छदना विहंगाः; सुरेन्द्रदत्तं तृषिताः पिबन्ति ।।
data.es: 'Thirsty birds rejoice drinking exceedingly pure water held in leafcups offered by Indra (in the form of rain), which looks like pearls collected in the leafcups. As the drops fall on them the hue of their wings seems to change (fade).
data.anv: सुरेन्द्रदत्तम् offered by lord of gods, Indra, मुक्तासकाशम् like pearls, पतत् while falling, सुनिर्मलम् exceedingly pure, पत्रपुटेषु in leaf cups, लग्नम् collected, सलिलम् water, तृषिताः thirsty ones, विवर्णच्छदनाः with faded wings, विहङ्गाः birds, हृष्टाः rejoice, पिबन्ति are drinking.
data.md: The birds, having their wings discoloured, being wet with water, delighted and thirsty, are drinking the drops of clear water, falling on leaves and discharged by the Lord of celestials*. *According to Hindu mythology Indra is the god of rains.

data.v: नीलेषु नीला नववारिपूर्णा; मेघेषु मेघाः प्रविभान्ति सक्ताः । दवाग्निदग्धेषु दवाग्निदग्धाः; शैलेषु शैला इव बद्धमूलाः ।।
data.es: 'Dark clouds filled with fresh water, leaning on dark clouds appear like boulders of rock, scorched with wild fire with their bases yet firmly rooted shining.
data.anv: नीलेषु dark, मेघेषु  clouds, सक्ताः leaned, नववारिपूर्णाः full of fresh water, नीलाः dark, मेघाः clouds, दवाग्निदग्देषु  burnt by forest fire, शैलेषु  mountain, बद्धमूलाः  yet firmly rooted, दवाग्निदग्धाः consumed by wild fire, शैलाः mountains, इव like, प्रतिभान्ति shining.
data.md: Clouds, big with new waters coming in, contact with violet ones are appearing as such; and sometimes, touching the hills brunt by forest-fire, are appearing like deep-rooted hills.

data.v: मत्ता गजेन्द्रा मुदिता गवेन्द्रा; वनेषु विश्रान्ततरा मृगेन्द्राः । रम्या नगेन्द्रा निभृता नगेन्द्राः; प्रक्रीडितो वारिधरैः सुरेन्द्रः ।।
data.es: 'Intoxicated elephants roam the forest. Mighty bulls rejoice. Kings of beasts (lions) lounge. Mountains look beautiful. Kings relax. While Indra, lord of the gods, sports with clouds.
data.anv: गजेन्द्राः elephants, मत्ताः proud, वनेषु in the forest, गवेन्द्राः proud bulls, मुदिताः are happy, मृगेन्द्राः king of animals, विश्रान्ततराः are taking rest, नगेन्द्राः mountains, रम्याः beautiful, नरेन्द्राः kings, निभृताः not moving, सुरेन्द्र: lord of gods, वारिधरैः with clouds, प्रक्रीडितः sporting.
data.md: (In this season) the elephants are infuriated, the bulls are delighted, the lions have grown more powerful, the hills are charming-the kings are devoid of all active pursuits, are the Lord of celestials is engaged in sport with clouds.

data.v: वृत्ता यात्रा नरेन्द्राणां सेना प्रतिनिवर्तते । वैराणि चैव मार्गाश्च सलिलेन समीकृताः ।।
data.es: 'Expeditions by kings come to a stop. The army returns. The flow of water blocks the roads. It suspends enmity (between states).
data.anv: नरेन्द्राणाम् kings, यात्रा expeditions, वृत्ता has been stopped, सेना army, प्रतिनिवर्तते is  returning, सलिलेन  with water, वैराणि enmities, चैव also, मार्गाश्च as well as roads also, समीकृताः are suspended.
data.md: The royal marches are all stopped, and the soldiers, who have already marched are waiting in the way-hostility and wayfares have been equally blockaded by water.

data.v: मासि प्रौष्ठपदे ब्रह्म ब्राह्मणानां विवक्षताम् । अयमध्यायसमयः सामगानामुपस्थितः ।।
data.es: 'The month of Bhadrapada meant for the recitation of the Vedas by brahmins and for those desirous of singing Sama Veda has started.
data.anv: प्रोष्ठपदे मासि in the month of Bhadrapada, ब्रह्म the Veda, विवक्षताम् of those desirous of reciting, सामगानाम् study of the singers of Sama veda, ब्राह्मणानाम् of brahmins, अयम् this, अध्यायसमयः time of study, उपस्थितः started
data.md: This month of Bhādra is the time of studying for those Brahmins, who chant Sāma Vedas.

data.v: निवृत्तकर्मायतनो नूनं संचितसंचयः । आषाढीमभ्युपगतो भरतः कोषकाधिपः ।।
data.es: 'Surely Bharata, king of Kosala, would have completed the collection of all his requirement before the commencement of the month of Asarh.
data.anv: निवृत्तकर्मायतनः completed all his work, सञ्चितसञ्चयः collected the requirements, कोसलाधिपः king of Kosala, भरतः Bharata, आषाढीम् month of Asarh, अभ्युपगतः has arrived नूनम् surely.
data.md: Having roofed all his houses and stored up his food, Bharata, the king of Kosala has set upon the performance of Așara sacrifices.

data.v: नूनमापूर्यमाणायाः सरय्वा वधते रयः । मां समीक्ष्य समायान्तमयोध्याया इव स्वनः ।।
data.es: 'Just as the cheerful voices of people of Ayodhya rise as soon as they see me returning, certainly the speed of river Sarayu is rising, filled with rain water.
data.anv: अपूर्यमाणायाः filled with water, सरव्या of Sarayu, रयः speed, समायान्तम् while I approach, माम् me, समीक्ष्य  seeing, अयोद्यायाः in Ayodhya, स्वनः इव cheers like, वर्धते is rising, नूनम् surely.
data.md: The river Saraju is now brimful with water. Seeing me return as if Ayodhyā herself is making a delightful noise.

data.v: इमाः स्फीतगुणा वर्षाः सुग्रीवः सुखमश्नुते । विजितारिः सदारश्च राज्ये महति च स्थितः ।।
data.es: 'Having defeated his enemy, Sugriva with his wife during the rainy season is wellestablished in the kingdom, abounding in merits.
data.anv: विजितारिः won the enemy, सदारश्च  with his wife, महति in great, राज्ये in kingdom, स्थितः च he attained, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, स्फीतगुणाः abounding in merits, इमाः वर्षाः during this rainy season, सुखम् happiness, अश्नुते experiencing.
data.md: Clearly manifest are now all the signs of the rainy season and Sugrīva, rid of his enemies, established on the vast kingdom, and regaining his wives, has attained to best felicity.

data.v: अहं तु हृतदारश्च राज्याच्च महतश्च्युतः । नदीकूलमिव क्लिन्नमवसीदामि लक्ष्मण ।।
data.es: 'O Lakshmana I have lost my wife. I have been dethroned from the mighty kingdom. I am sinking like a river bank overflowed.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, हृतदारश्च  with lost wife, महतः from the mighty, राज्यात् from the kingdom, च्युतश्च dethroned, अहं तु  I am even, क्लिन्नम् overflowed with water, नदीकूलम् इव like the bank of river, अवसीदामि I am sinking.
data.md: And I am, O Laksmana, waning every day like to the banks of a river, being separated from my spouse and deprived of my vast kingdom.

data.v: शोकश्च मम विस्तीर्णो वर्षाश्च भृशदुर्गमाः । रावणश्च महाञ्शत्रुरपारं प्रतिभाति मे ।।
data.es: 'My sorrow which increases, the rains which make it hard to cover distances and Ravana the great enemyall these appear difficult to conquer.
data.anv: मम my, शोकश्च sorrow, विस्तीर्णः great, वर्षाश्च these rains, भृशदुर्गमाः difficult to cross, रावणश्च Ravana also, महान् great, शत्रुः enemy, मे me, अपारम् to cross over, प्रतिभाति it appears.
data.md: Immense is my grief, inaccessible is this rainy season and mighty is my enemy, Ravana; methinks it is impossible for me to bring about the discomfiture of my foe.

data.v: अयात्रां चैव दृष्ट्वेमां मार्गांश्च भृशदुर्गमान् । प्रणते चैव सुग्रीवे न मया किंचिदीरितम् ।।
data.anv: सुग्रीवे when Sugriva, प्रणते चैव is faithful to me, इमाम् this, अयात्राम् suspending the expedition, भृशदुर्गमान् very difficult, मार्गांश्च road, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, मया myself, किञ्चित् even a little, न ईरितम् not spoken.
data.md: Owing to the unfitness of the season (for marching against my foe) and the wayfares being inaccessible, I cannot possibly request Sugrīva (to march) although he is prepared to abide by my mandate.

data.v: अपि चातिपरिक्लिष्टं चिराद्दारैः समागतम् । आत्मकार्यगरीयस्त्वाद्वक्तुं नेच्छामि वानरम् ।।
data.es: 'Since Sugriva has gone through great difficulties and is reunited with his wives after a long time and since our task is great, I did not desire to speak to him now.
data.anv: अपिच and also, अतिपरिक्लिष्टम् one who experienced great difficulties, चिरात् after a long time, दारैः with his wife, समागतम् reunited, वानरम् monkey, आत्मकार्यगरीयस्त्वात् due to our task being greater, वक्तुम् to speak, नेच्छामि I do not desire.
data.md: Moreover after a good deal of affliction he has regained his wives, and my service is of very great difficulty; so I do not wish to request that monkey-chief now.

data.v: स्वयमेव हि विश्रम्य ज्ञात्वा कालमुपागतम् । उपकारं च सुग्रीवो वेत्स्यते नात्र संशयः ।।
data.anv: सुग्रीवः Sugriva, विश्रम्य after resting, कालम् time, उपागतम् has come, ज्ञात्वा after knowing, उपकारं च help also, स्वयमेव himself, वेत्स्यते will know, हि indeed, अत्र about that, संशयः doubt, न no.
data.md: Forsooth, shall Sugrīva think of the benefits (he has received from me) after enjoying rest for sometime, when the time for action shall arrive.

data.v: तस्मात्कालप्रतीक्षोऽहं स्थितोऽस्मि शुभलक्षण । सुग्रीवस्य नदीनां च प्रसादमनुपालयन् ।।
data.es: 'I will wait for autumn. I will stick to your advice while I wait until Sugriva and the rivers are pleased (with moderate flow of water.)
data.anv: सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva's, नदीनां च and rivers, प्रसादम् pleasure, अनुपालयन् waiting for, शरत्कालम् for autumn, प्रतीक्षिष्ये I will wait, तव your, वचने words, स्थितः अस्मि  resolute.
data.md: I shall live here, awaiting the autumn and abiding by your words and awaiting as well Sugrīva's pleasure and the clear currents of the rivers.

data.v: उपकारेण वीरो हि प्रतिकारेण युज्यते । अकृतज्ञोऽप्रतिकृतो हन्ति सत्त्ववतां मनः ।।
data.es: A hero should in return help whoever has helped him. An ungrateful person hurts the heart of the virtuous by not returning the assistance.'
data.anv: उपकारेण with him, वीरः hero, प्रतीकारेण by helping in turn, युज्यते will not fail to do, अकृतज्ञः ungrateful, अप्रतिकृतः one who does not return a favour, सत्त्ववताम् spirited people's, मनः heart, हन्ति destroys.
data.md: Heroes receiving benefits, do always return them. The ungrateful lose the good wishes of the great ones.

data.v: अथैवमुक्तः प्रणिधाय लक्ष्मणः; कृताञ्जलिस्तत्प्रतिपूज्य भाषितम् । उवाच रामं स्वभिराम दर्शनं; प्रदर्शयन्दर्शनमात्मनः शुभम् ।।
data.es: Then Lakshmana reflected upon the words of Rama thoughtfully. He honoured his brother's words by receiving his advice with folded hands and spoke to his handsome brother giving out his own views:
data.anv: लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, अथ thereupon, एवम् in this way ,उक्त: told, प्रणिधाय after reflecting thoughtfully, कृताञ्जलिः with folded palms in suplication, तत् that, भाषितम् words expresed, प्रतिपूज्य after honouring, आत्मनः his own, शुभम् auspicious, दर्शनम् view, प्रदर्शयन्   expressing, स्वभिरामदर्शनम् him who is handsome, रामम् Rama, उवाच said.
data.md: Heroes receiving favours always return them; the ungrateful lose the friendship of the welcoming them therefore, Laksmana, with folded hands, spoke to Rāma of graceful appearance, displaying his own intelligence,

data.v: यथोक्तमेतत्तव सर्वमीप्सितं; नरेन्द्र कर्ता नचिराद्धरीश्वरः । शरत्प्रतीक्षः क्षमतामिमं भवा;ञ्जलप्रपातं रिपुनिग्रहे धृतः ।।
data.es: 'O lord of men, your desire will be fulfilled soon. Be determined to fight the enemy while waiting for autumn. Forgive this rainy season (and its water that obstructs).
data.anv: नरेन्द्र king, यथा as, अद्धरीश्वर excellant king, नचिरात् soon, तव your, ईप्सितम् desire, एतत् सर्वम् all this, कर्ता going to do, रिपुनिग्रहे to combat with the enemy, धृतः be determined, भवान् thyself, शरत्प्रतीक्षः waiting for autumn, इमम् this, जलप्रपातम् waterflow, क्षमताम्  forgive.
data.md: O lord of men, I fully approve of all you had said. The monkey-chief shall soon engage in our service. Resolved on the destruction of your enemy, do you spend here this rainy season awaiting the autumn.

data.v: समीक्ष्य विमलं व्योम गतविद्युद्बलाहकम् । सारसारवसंघुष्टं रम्यज्योत्स्नानुलेपनम् ।।
data.es: Looking at the sky rid of clouds and lightning, filled with the sounds of flocks of sarasa birds, Rama cried in a pitiable state.
data.anv: व्योमं sky, गतविद्युद्वलाहकम् rid of clouds and lightning, सारसारवसङ्घुष्टम् filled with the cackle of flocks of Sarasa cranes, विमलम् clear, दृष्ट्वा च on glancing, आर्तया in a pitiable, गिरा tone, विललाप cried.

data.v: समृद्धार्थं च सुग्रीवं मन्दधर्मार्थसंग्रहम् । अत्यर्थमसतां मार्गमेकान्तगतमानसं ।।
निवृत्तकार्यं सिद्धार्थं प्रमदाभिरतं सदा । प्राप्तवन्तमभिप्रेतान्सर्वानेव मनोरथान् ।।
स्वां च पात्नीमभिप्रेतां तारां चापि समीप्सिताम् । विहरन्तमहोरात्रं कृतार्थं विगतज्वलम् ।।
क्रीडन्तमिव देवेशं नन्दनेऽप्सरसां गणैः । मन्त्रिषु न्यस्तकार्यं च मन्त्रिणामनवेक्षकम् ।।
उत्सन्नराज्यसंदेशं कामवृत्तमवस्थितम् । निश्चितार्थोऽर्थतत्त्वज्ञः कालधर्मविशेषवित् ।।
प्रसाद्य वाक्यैर्मधुरैर्हेतुमद्भिर्मनोरमैः । वाक्यविद्वाक्यतत्त्वज्ञं हरीशं मारुतात्मजः ।।
हितं तथ्यं च पथ्यं च सामधर्मार्थनीतिमत् । प्रणयप्रीतिसंयुक्तं विश्वासकृतनिश्चयम् । हरीश्वरमुपागम्य हनुमान्वाक्यमब्रवीत् ।।
राज्यं प्राप्तं यशश्चैव कौली श्रीरभिवर्थिता । मित्राणां संग्रहः शेषस्तद्भवान्कर्तुमर्हति ।।
data.es: 'You have attained the kingdom. You have earned fame. The prosperity of your family has gone up. All that remains is to earn the goodwill of friends. Attend to that now.
data.anv: राज्यम् kingdom, यशश्चैव and fame, प्राप्तम् attained, कौली of the family, श्रीः prosperity, अभिवर्धिता heightened, मित्राणाम् of friends, सङ्ग्रहः earning good will, शेषः remains, तम् that( duty), भवान् by you, कर्तुम् to do, अर्हति  is proper
data.md: You have attained your kingdom, fame, and your vast ancestral wealth. It now behoveth you to perform your duties by your friends.

data.v: यो हि मित्रेषु कालज्ञः सततं साधु वर्तते । तस्य राज्यं च कीर्तिश्च प्रतापश्चाभिवर्धते ।।
data.es: 'The kingdom, glory and fame of a king who knows the value of time and conducts himself well towards his allies always grows.
data.anv: यो हि he who, कालज्ञः knows the value of time, सततम् always, मित्रेषु towards friends, साधु  well, वर्तते conducts, तस्य his, राज्यं च kingdom and, कीर्तिश्च fame, प्रतापश्च glory, वर्धते will increase.
data.md: Truly does his kingdom, fame and prowess increase who is cognizant of the seasonableness of time and does good to his friends.

data.v: यस्य कोशश्च दण्डश्च मित्राण्यात्मा च भूमिप । समवेतानि सर्वाणि स राज्यं महदश्नुते ।।
data.es: 'He to whom the treasury, sceptre, allies and his own self all these are equally dear, enjoys a large kingdom.
data.anv: भूमिप O king, यस्य he who, कोशश्च treasury, दण्डश्च and sceptre, मित्राणि allies, आत्मा च and his own self, समवेतानि are equally dear सर्वाणि all, सः he, महत् great, राज्यम् kingdom, अश्नुते will get.
data.md: O king, truly does he attain to a vast kingdom, who has the same wealth, soldiery and body with his friends.

data.v: तद्भवान्वृत्तसंपन्नः स्थितः पथि निरत्यये । मित्रार्थमभिनीतार्थं यथावत्कर्तुमर्हति ।।
data.es: 'Endowed with right conduct, you ought to duly answer the cause of your ally conforming to proper course of action.
data.anv: तत् therefore, वृत्तसम्पन्नः endowed with right conduct, भवान् you, निरत्यये devoted, स्थितः  conforming to, अभिनीतार्थम् a proper course of action, मित्रार्थम् for the cause of ally यथावत् duly, कर्तुम् doing, अर्हति it is proper.
data.md: It becometh you, therefore, who are crowned with a good character, and who did wend a blameless track, to work out your friend's well being (as promised by you).

data.v: यस्तु कालव्यतीतेषु मित्रकार्येषु वर्तते । स कृत्वा महतोऽप्यर्थान्न मित्रार्थेन युज्यते ।।
data.es: 'He who exceeds the time limit in accomplishing a friend's task, and puts forth great effort later succeeds not.
data.anv: यः he who, कालव्यतीतेषु exceedng the time limit, मित्रकार्येषु in his friend's task, वर्तते acts, सः he, महतः great, अर्थान् effort, कृत्वा does, मित्रार्थेन for the cause of  friend, न युज्यते not  succeed.
data.md: He, who engage in his friend's service after the proper season is over, does nothing to his well-being, though he performs a great thing.

data.v: क्रियतां राघवस्यैतद्वैदेह्याः परिमार्गणम् । तदिदं वीर कार्यं ते कालातीतमरिंदम ।।
data.es: 'O subduer of enemies we should do the brave deed of finding Vaidehi for the sake of your friend. O crusher of enemies this is your duty at present and it is already delayed.
data.anv: अरिन्दम O subduer of enemies, नः for us, तत् that, इदम् this, वीरकार्यम् heroic deed, मित्रकार्यम् for the sake of friend, वैदेह्यः Vaidehi's, परिमार्गणम् search, राघवस्य Rama's, एतत् this, क्रियताम् may be done, अरिन्दम O crusher of enemies, वीर hero, तत् that, इदम् this, कार्यम् task, ते to you, कालातीतम् already delayed.

data.v: न च कालमतीतं ते निवेदयति कालवित् । त्वरमाणोऽपि सन्प्राज्ञस्तव राजन्वशानुगः ।।
data.es: 'O king a wise man (like Rama) who is aware of timely action would not tell you even if it is unduly delayed, even when he is in a hurry to get the work done, since he is staying in your kingdom (since he is dependant on you).
data.anv: राजन् O king, प्राज्ञः a wise person, कालवित् one who is aware of the importance of timely action, सः he, त्वरमाणोऽपि even if he is in a hurry, तव your, वशानुगः staying( in your kingdom), अतीतम् exceeding, कालम् time, ते to you, न निवेदयति will not report.
data.md: o king, Rāma, conversant with the scasonableness of time and wise as he is, is not inforining you of it, though the proper time is past; and though he is in hurry, he is waiting for you.

data.v: कुलस्य केतुः स्फीतस्य दीर्घबन्धुश्च राघवः । अप्रमेयप्रभावश्च स्वयं चाप्रतिमो गुणैः ।।
