data.es: 'Rama is responsible in lending stability to you and to your wellknown family. He will continue to be your ally for a long time. Let it be known that his power is boundless and his virtues peerless.
data.anv: राघवः Rama, स्फीतस्य prosperity, कुलस्य of your family, हेतुः responsible, दीर्घबन्धुश्च a long time ally, स्वयम् yourself, अप्रमेयप्रभावश्च a man of immeasurable power, गुणैः in virtues, अप्रतिमः peerless.
data.md: Rāghava, as well as Lakşmaņa, who are the instruments of your attaining to this vast kingdom, and your friends for so long a time, are persons of incomparable prowess by virtue of their unequalled accomplishments. He has already performed your service, and it behoveth you now, O lord of monkeys, to command the foremost of monkeys to engage in his service.

data.v: तस्य त्वं कुरु वै कार्यं पूर्वं तेन कृतं तव । हरीश्वर हरिश्रेष्ठानाज्ञापयितुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: 'O king pray accomplish his object the same way he has accomplished your own. You ought to issue orders to the foremost of the monkeys.
data.anv: हरीश्वर O king of monkeys, पूर्वम् earlier, तेन by him, तव to you, कृतम् done, त्वम् you, तस्य his, कार्यम् task, कुरु वै you may do, कपिश्रेष्ठान् आज्ञापयितुम् to order the best of monkeys, अर्हसि it will be proper for you.
data.md: Rāghava, as well as Lakşmaņa, who are the instruments of your attaining to this vast kingdom, and your friends for so long a time, are persons of incomparable prowess by virtue of their unequalled accomplishments. He has already performed your service, and it behoveth you now, O lord of monkeys, to command the foremost of monkeys to engage in his service.

data.v: न हि तावद्भवेत्कालो व्यतीतश्चोदनादृते । चोदितस्य हि कार्यस्य भवेत्कालव्यतिक्रमः ।।
data.es: 'Time will not be deemed lapsed in vain if the work is sincerely taken up without delay and without pressure from your ally, Rama. If it is undertaken under pressure, it will be considered transgression of time.
data.anv: चोदनादृते before prompting, कालः time, व्यतीतः elapsed न तावत् भवेत् cannot be used, चोदितस्य if he directs, कार्यस्य the task, कालव्यतिक्रमः time limit has elapsed, भवेत् will happen.
data.md: T To engage, out of season, in a service, uncalled for, is not blameable; but to defer the performance of an action in proper time after promising is indeed an object of censure.

data.v: अकर्तुरपि कार्यस्य भवान्कर्ता हरीश्वर । किं पुनः प्रतिकर्तुस्ते राज्येन च धनेन च ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys help even a person who has not helped you. As such, do you need to be told that you should help one, with whose help you have earned wealth and kingdom?
data.anv: हरीश्वर O lord of monkeys, कार्यस्य of the task, अकर्तुरपि even if one has not done the task, भवान् you, कर्ता doer, धनेन च  wealth and, राज्येन च also kingdom, ते to you, प्रतिकर्तु: who performs the task in return, किं पुनः what to say again?
data.md: O lord of monkeys, you did engage even in the service of one who does you no good, then why shall you not engage in the benefit of Rāma who has favoured you by encompassing the destruction (of Vāli) and securing for you your kingdom.

data.v: शक्तिमानसि विक्रान्तो वानरर्ष्क गणेश्वर । कर्तुं दाशरथेः प्रीतिमाज्ञायां किं नु सज्जसे ।।
data.es: 'O protector of the monkeys, you are powerful and you are prompt. Why don't you issue orders which will please Rama?
data.anv: वानरर्क्षगणेश्वर O protector of the monkey force, शक्तिमान् powerful, विक्रान्तः advancing forward, दाशरथेः Dasaratha's Rama, प्रीतिम् pleasure, कर्तुम् to do, अज्ञायाम् in issuing orders, किं न सज्जसे why do you not get ready?
data.md: O lord of monkeys and bears, truly you are gifted with prowess and strength, why did you not prepare yourself for satisfying Dāśarathee's commands?

data.v: कामं खलु शरैर्शक्तः सुरासुरमहोरगान् । वशे दाशरथिः कर्तुं त्वत्प्रतिज्ञां तु काङ्क्षते ।।
data.es: 'Indeed, Rama is fully capable of subduing gods, demons as well as nagas with his arrows. He is looking for your help in view of your promise.
data.anv: दाशरथिः Rama, शरैः with arrows, सुरासुरमहोरगान् gods or demons and nagas, वशे under control, कर्तुम् to do, कामम् indeed, शक्तः खलु he has the capacity, त्वत् प्रतिज्ञाम् your swearing, हि indeed, काङ्क्षते he is looking for.
data.md: Dāśarathee himself is capable of subduing the celestials, Asuras and great serpents-he is simply awaiting the fulfilment of your promise.

data.v: प्राणत्यागाविशङ्केन कृतं तेन तव प्रियम् । तस्य मार्गाम वैदेहीं पृथिव्यामपि चाम्बरे ।।
data.es: 'He has done you a deed dear to you without hesitation, risking his own life.Let us help him in search of his Vaidehi whether she is on earth or in heaven.
data.anv: प्राणत्यागाविशङ्केन risking his life without hesitation, तेन by him, तव your, प्रियम् dear, कृतम् work, तस्य his, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, पृथिव्याम् on  earth, अम्बरेऽपि च or in heaven, मार्गाम let us search.
data.md: He has performed a great service at the risk of his life-we shall therefore find out Vaidehī whether she is in this earth or in the welkin,

data.v: न देवा न च गन्धर्वा नासुरा न मरुद्गणाः । न च यक्षा भयं तस्य कुर्युः किमुत राक्षसाः ।।
data.es: 'Not gods, demons, gandharvas or even marutas, suras or yakshas can cause fright in him much less the rakshasas.
data.anv: देवदानव गन्धर्वा gods, demons or gandharvas, न मरुद्गणाः or marutas, असुराः deities, यक्षाः च and yakshas, तस्य for him, भयम् fright, न कुर्युः not cause, राक्षसाः demons, किमुत what to say of.
data.md: Even the celestials, Dānavas, Gandharabas, Asuras, Mārutas, Yakşas are afraid of him in the battle-field-what of the insignificant Raksasas.

data.v: तदेवं शक्तियुक्तस्य पूर्वं प्रियकृतस्तथा । रामस्यार्हसि पिङ्गेश कर्तुं सर्वात्मना प्रियम् ।।
data.es: 'Therefore, O king of monkeys you ought to oblige Rama wholeheartedly exerting all your strength, as he has done your work.
data.anv: पिङ्गेश O king of monekys तत् that, एवं शक्तियुक्तस्य exerting all your strength, पूर्वम्  earlier, तव your, प्रियकृतः done the work desired by you, रामस्य Rama's, सर्वात्मना  wholeheartedly, प्रियम् dear, कर्तुम् to do, अर्हसि will be proper.
data.md: O lord of monkeys, it therefore behoveth you to do good by all means to the powerful Rāma, who benefited you before.

data.v: नाधस्तादवनौ नाप्सु गतिर्नोपरि चाम्बरे । कस्यचित्सज्जतेऽस्माकं कपीश्वर तवाज्ञया ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys commanded by you, each one of us or all of us together can ransack the underworld, the earth, or water or heaven.
data.anv: कपीश्वर O lord of monkeys, तव your, आज्ञया by orders, अस्माकम् for us, कस्यचित् of any place, अधस्तात् underground, सज्जते made possible, अवनौ on the earth, अप्सु in water, न or, उपरि up , अम्बरे च and in the sky, न or else.
data.md: O lord of monkeys, who is there among us, who shall not at your command proceed to : water, sky or the region under the earth?

data.v: तदाज्ञापय कः किं ते कृते वसतु कुत्रचित् । हरयो ह्यप्रधृष्यास्ते सन्ति कोट्यग्रतोऽनघ ।।
data.es: O sinless hero therefore issue your command. There are more than a crore of invincible monkeys. Determine now who should do and what and in which place. We are at your service'.
data.anv: अनघ sinless hero, तत् therefore, आज्ञापय you order, कः who, किं what, कुत:from where,  व्यवस्यतु determine to act, ते your, कोट्यग्रतः more than a crore, अप्रधृष्याः invincible, हरयः vanaras, सन्ति हि at your service.
data.md: O blameless one, there are more than one koți of invincible monkeys under you, do you command, who shall proceed and to what quarter?

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा काले साधुनिवेदितम् । सुग्रीवः सत्त्वसंपन्नश्चकार मतिमुत्तमाम् ।।
data.es: Sugriva who had a great sense of duty, started applying his mind, when he heard the honest advice of Hanuman.
data.anv: तस्य his, काले at proper time, साधु honest, निवेदनम्  advice, तत् वचनम् those words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, सत्त्वसम्पन्नः one who has great sense of duty, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, उत्तमाम् best, मतिम् mind, चकार set on.
data.md: Hearing these words of Hanumān, said on a very proper occasion, the intelligent Sugrīva, made up his mind for a worthy end.

data.v: स संदिदेशाभिमतं नीलं नित्यकृतोद्यमम् । दिक्षु सर्वासु सर्वेषां सैन्यानामुपसंग्रहे ।।
data.es: He sent word to the ever diligent Nila, his favourite, to collect all cadres of army of the monkeys from all directions.
data.anv: अभिमतम् his favourite one, सर्वासु in all, दिक्षु in directions, सर्वेषाम् of all vanaras, सैन्यानाम् army cadres, उपसङ्ग्रहे to gether, नित्यकृतोद्यमम्  ever diligent, नीलम् Nila, सन्दिदेश sent
data.md: Thereupon the highly intelligent Sugrīva ordered the ever active Neela, to collect soldiers from various quarters. Do you so arrange as all my hosts and soldiers with their commanders soon come here.

data.v: यथा सेना समग्रा मे यूथपालाश्च सर्वशः । समागच्छन्त्यसंगेन सेनाग्राणि तथा कुरु ।।
data.es: 'Let the entire army with leaders of different groups assemble here seperately. O chief of army act accordingly.
data.anv: मे my, समग्रा all, सेना army, यूथपालाश्च group leaders, सर्वशः all over, असङ्गेन independently, यथा as, सेनाग्राणि O hero of the army, समागच्छन्ति will be assemble, तथा like that, कुरु you may act.

data.v: ये त्वन्तपालाः प्लवगाः शीघ्रगा व्यवसायिनः । समानयन्तु ते सैन्यं त्वरिताः शासनान्मम । स्वयं चानन्तरं सैन्यं भवानेवानुपश्यतु ।।
data.es: 'Let the swiftfooted monkeys, guardians of frontiers, army chiefs muster soon in obedience to my command. You (Nila) alone should personally supervise the work to be done next.
data.anv: अन्तपालाः chiefs, सैन्यं army, शीघ्रगाः swiftfooted, व्यवसायिनः  guardians of frontiers, ये प्लवगाः monkeys, ते they, मम my, शासनान् orders, त्वरिताः quickly, सैन्यं army, समानयन्तु may get here, अनन्तरं कार्यम् the task to be done later, भवान् you, एव only, स्वयम् personally, अनुपश्यतु  supervise.
data.md: Do you soon bring here at my behest all the energetic and quick-coursing monkeys and commanders spreading their conquests to the end of the earth.

data.v: त्रिपञ्चरात्रादूर्ध्वं यः प्राप्नुयान्नेह वानरः । तस्य प्राणान्तिको दण्डो नात्र कार्या विचारणा ।।
data.anv: यः वानरः such vanara, त्रिपञ्चरात्रात् after three or five nights, ऊर्ध्वम् over and above, इह here, प्राप्नुयात् may reach, तस्य his, प्राणान्तिकः  death sentence, दण्डः punishment, अत्र here, विचारणाः thought, न कार्या  no doubt
data.md: (After their arrival) do you yourself inspect and count all those monkeys. He who shall not reach here within fifteen days shall be punished with the loss of his life.

data.v: हरींश्च वृद्धानुपयातु साङ्गदो; भवान्ममाज्ञामधिकृत्य निश्चिताम् । इति व्यवस्थां हरिपुंगवेश्वरो; विधाय वेश्म प्रविवेश वीर्यवान् ।।
data.es: 'In strict obedience to my orders, go with Angada to the elderly monkeys and inform them about my decision and order'. After making this arrangement valiant Sugriva entered his residence.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये किष्किन्धाकाण्डे एकोनत्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentyninth sarga of Kishkindakanda of the Holy Ramayana, the first epic, composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: साङ्गदः along with Angada, भवान् you, मम my, आज्ञाम्र orders, अधिकृत्य concerning, निश्चिताम् decidedly, वृद्धान् elderly, हरीन् monkeys, उपयातु approach, वीर्यवान् valiant, हरिपुङ्गवेश्वरः lord of monkeys, इति thus, व्यवस्थाम् arrangement, विधाय by making, वेश्म his residence, प्रविवेश entered.
data.md: There is no need of scrutinizing my orders. Abiding by my order, do you see along with Angada all the elderly monkeys. having thus arranged, that best of monkeys entered the inner apartment.

data.v: गुहां प्रविष्टे सुग्रीवे विमुक्ते गगने घनैः । वर्षरात्रोषितो रामः कामशोकाभिपीडितः ।।
पाण्डुरं गगनं दृष्ट्वा विमलं चन्द्रमण्डलम् । शारदीं रजनीं चैव दृष्ट्वा ज्योत्स्नानुलेपनाम् ।।
कामवृत्तं च सुग्रीवं नष्टां च जनकात्मजाम् । बुद्ध्वा कालमतीतं च मुमोह परमातुरः ।।
स तु संज्ञामुपागम्य मुहूर्तान्मतिमान्पुनः । मनःस्थामपि वैदेहीं चिन्तयामास राघवः ।।
data.es: Gaining back the senses after a while, wise Rama started thinking about Vaidehi, who remained in his heart.
data.anv: मतिमान् sensible man, पुन: again, सः राघवः that Rama, मुहूर्तात् in a short time, संज्ञाम् consciousness, उपागम्य having regained, मनःस्थामपि present in his mind, वैदेहीम् of Vaidehi, चिन्तयामास thinking of.
data.md: And regaining his sense after sometime, the highly intelligent king-Räghava began to think of Vaidehĩ although always present in his mind.

data.v: आसीनः पर्वतस्याग्रे हेमधातुविभूषिते । शारदं गगनं दृष्ट्व जगाम मनसा प्रियाम् ।।
data.es: Sitting on top of the mountain shining with gold and minerals, Rama gazed at the pleasant autumnal sky and started thinking of his beloved.
data.anv: पर्वतस्य mountain's, हेमधातुविभूषिते adorned with gold and minerals, अग्रे on top, आसीनः seated, शारदम् autumnal, गगनम् sky, दृष्ट्वा on glancing, मनसा in his mind, प्रियाम् of the beloved, जगाम went on thinking.
data.md: And beholding the clear sky void of lightnings and clouds and filled with the noise of Sārasas, Rāghava began to lament piteously, stationing himself on the summit of the hill ornamented with metals of golden hue. And beholding the autumnal sky he engaged in the meditation of his beloved spouse.

data.v: दृष्ट्वा च विमलं व्योम गतविद्युद्बलाहकम् । सारसारवसंघुष्टं विललापार्तया गिरा ।।
data.es: Looking at the sky rid of clouds and lightning, filled with the sounds of flocks of sarasa birds, Rama cried in a pitiable state.
data.anv: व्योमं sky, गतविद्युद्वलाहकम् rid of clouds and lightning, सारसारवसङ्घुष्टम् filled with the cackle of flocks of Sarasa cranes, विमलम् clear, दृष्ट्वा च on glancing, आर्तया in a pitiable, गिरा tone, विललाप cried.
data.md: And beholding the clear sky void of lightnings and clouds and filled with the noise of Sārasas, Rāghava began to lament piteously, stationing himself on the summit of the hill ornamented with metals of golden hue. And beholding the autumnal sky he engaged in the meditation of his beloved spouse.

data.v: सारसारवसंनादैः सारसारवनादिनी । याश्रमे रमते बाला साद्य मे रमते कथम् ।।
data.es: 'How will the young lady (Sita) whose voice is like the sarasa bird's, who was revelling, listening to its sweet cackle at the hermitage be living now?
data.anv: सारासारावनादिनी (lady whose voice) resembles that of sarasa birds, या बाला that young lady, आश्रमे in the hermitage, सारासारावसन्नादैः with sweet sounds of sarasa birds, रमते enjoying, सा she, अद्य now, कथम् how, रमते  revelling?
data.md: How shall that Sarasa-voiced damsel be pleased to-day, who, while sporting in the hermitage, used to warble like Sārasas, to invite them.

data.v: पुष्पितांश्चासनान्दृष्ट्वा काञ्चनानिव निर्मलान् । कथं स रमते बाला पश्यन्ती मामपश्यती ।।
data.es: 'How will my beloved wife feel on seeing the asana flowers which are as pure as gold, when she does not find me anywhere?
data.anv: पुष्पितान् blossomed, काञ्चनानिव like gold, निर्मलान् pure, असनान् asana flowers, दृष्ट्वा seeing, पश्यन्ती while seeing, माम् me, अपश्यती not seeing, सा बाला that young lady, कथम् how, रमते will she feel?
data.md: Beholding Asana trees, as if covered with golden flowers and not beholding me how shall that damsel be pleased?

data.v: या पुरा कलहंसानां स्वरेण कलभाषिणी । बुध्यते चारुसर्वाङ्गी साद्य मे बुध्यते कथम् ।।
data.es: 'How will my Sita with her charming limbs and sweet words, who used to get up from sleep by the cackle of swans, wake up now?
data.anv: चारुसर्वाङ्गी a lady with beautiful limbs, कलभाषिणी sweettongued, या she, पुरा earlier, कलहंसानाम् of the swans, स्वरेण by the sound, बुध्यते is awakened, मे my, सा she, अद्य now, कथम् how, बुद्ध्यते is awakened.
data.md: How that exquisitely fine damsel having a sweet voice shall be pleased to-day, who used formerly to awake at the sounds of the drakes.?

data.v: निःस्वनं चक्रवाकानां निशम्य सहचारिणाम् । पुण्डरीकविशालाक्षी कथमेषा भविष्यति ।।
data.es: 'How will that lady with large, pale white eyes sustain her life now, since she is used to listening to the sweet notes of chakravaka birds, who were her companions?
data.anv: पुण्डरीकविशालाक्षी lady with large, pale white eyes, एषा such, सहचारिणाम् of her companions, चक्रवाकानाम् of Chakravaka birds, निस्वनम् sweet voices, निशम्य  listening, कथम् how, भविष्यति will she be.
data.md: Hearing the noise of her companionsCakravākas, how shali that one, of expansive eyes resembling lotuses, live?

data.v: सरांसि सरितो वापीः काननानि वनानि च । तां विना मृगशावाक्षीं चरन्नाद्य सुखं लभे ।।
data.es: 'Even though I am wandering by lakes, rivers, wells, forests and groves,I am not happy without that fawneyed lady.
data.anv: सरांसि lakes, सरितः rivers, वापीः wells, काननानि forests, वनानि च and groves, चरन् wandering, अद्य now, ताम् मृगशाबाक्षीं that fawneyed lady, विना without, सुखम् pleasure, न लभे not happy.
data.md: Without her having the eyes of a fawn, I do not attain to felicity to-day, ranging at large by ponds, streams, pools and in forests and woods.

data.v: अपि तां मद्वियोगाच्च सौकुमार्याच्च भामिनीम् । न दूरं पीडयेत्कामः शरद्गुणनिरन्तरः ।।
data.es: 'I think even the charm of autumn must be always tormenting that lovely lady, as she is very far from me. She is too delicate to suffer the agony of separation.'
data.anv: शरद्गुणनिरन्तरः charm of autumn, कामः Cupid, सौकुमार्यात्  of delicate body, मद्वियोगाच्च due to separation, ताम् from me, भामिनीम् lovely lady, सुदूरम् very far, पीडयेत् अपि tormented.
data.md: Forsooth shall Cupid excited by the approach of the autumn, distress her the more on account of my separation and her personal charms.

data.v: एवमादि नरश्रेष्ठो विललाप नृपात्मजः । विहंग इव सारङ्गः सलिलं त्रिदशेश्वरात् ।।
data.es: Thus the best among the princes wailed just as chakrabaka laments for water from Indra, lord of the gods.
data.anv: नरश्रेष्ठ: best of men, नृपात्मजः prince, त्रिदशेश्वरात् from lord of the gods, सलिलम् water, सारङ्गः Saranga, विहङ्ग इव like bird, एवमादि in the same way, विललाप he lamented.
data.md: Thus bewailed that best son of a king like to the bird Sāranga soliciting water from the lord of celestials.

data.v: ततश्चञ्चूर्य रम्येषु फलार्थी गिरिसानुषु । ददर्श पर्युपावृत्तो लक्ष्मीवाँल्लक्ष्मणोऽग्रजम् ।।
data.es: Graceful Lakshmana returned after going round and round the beautiful mountain slopes for fruits and saw his brother.
data.anv: ततः then, फलार्थी for getting fruits, रम्येषु from the beautiful, गिरिसानुषु the mountain slopes, चञ्चूर्य went about looking, पर्युपावृत्तः going round and round, लक्ष्मीवान् graceful man, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, अग्रजम् elder brother, ददर्श saw.
data.md: And the graceful Lakşmaņa, returning from the picturesque mountain-summits where he had sojourned in quest of fruits, beheld his elder brother.

data.v: तं चिन्तया दुःसहया परीतं; विसंज्ञमेकं विजने मनस्वी । भ्रातुर्विषादात्परितापदीनः; समीक्ष्य सौमित्रिरुवाच रामम् ।।
data.es: Observing Rama who had lost his senses, lying alone in unbearable agony, venerable Lakshmana became sad and miserable and spoke to his brother:
data.anv: मनस्वी venerable, तं him, सौमित्रिः Saumithri, दुस्सहया with the unbearable, चिन्तया with sorrow, परीतम् extreme agony, विसंज्ञम् lost senses, एकं alone, समीक्ष्य observing, भ्रातुः brother's, विषादात् with grief, परितापदीनः pathetic and dejected, (त्वरितः at once) रामम् to Rama, उवाच spoke.
data.md: And beholding in that lonely forest his brother, racked with anxious thoughts hard to bear and almost beside himself (with grief) the high-minded Saumitri, prompted by his brother's grief, spoke to him very poorly, saying.

data.v: किमार्य कामस्य वशंगतेन; किमात्मपौरुष्यपराभवेन । अयं सदा संहृइयते समाधिः; किमत्र योगेन निवर्तितेन ।।
data.es: 'O revered brother why do you succumb to passion and loss of selfconfidence? Why is the usual composure of your mind withdrawn? Why do you desist from yaga?
data.anv: आर्य O revered (brother), कामस्य वशंगतेन succumbed to passion, किम् why, आत्मपौरुष्य  selfconfidence, पराभवेन defeat, किम् of what use, सदा ever, अयम् this, समाधिः composure, संहियते is withdrawn, अत्र निवर्तितेन desisting from, योगेन from yoga, किम् why?
data.md: O worshipful one, what have you perpetrated by placing yourself under the control of passions and defeating your manliness? Your deep and devout meditation has been purloined by your grief; and it is by religious contemplation that your grief shall be terminated now.

data.v: क्रियाभियोगं मनसः प्रसादं; समाधियोगानुगतं च कालम् । सहायसामर्थ्यमदीनसत्त्व; स्वकर्महेतुं च कुरुष्व हेतुम् ।।
data.es: 'You are an undaunted warrior. Take to the path of action. Resort to samadhiyoga or meditation and regain the serenity of mind. Make the strength of your effort the source of your success.
data.anv: अदीनसत्त्व: an undaunted warrior, क्रियाभियोगम् make efforts to work, मनसः mind's, प्रसादम् serenity, समाधियोगानुगतम् followed by contemplative mood, कालं च taking advantage of time, सहायसामर्थ्यम् strength of effort, हेतुम् cause, स्वकर्म च by your own effort, हेतुम् cause of success, कुरुष्व  achieve.
data.md: O brother, after going through the ceremonies of bathing and so forth, and acquiring peace, do you bring all your time under your control by virtue of the concentration of soul; and being of unmitigated strength do you resort to power and help, the key-notes for the accomplishment of your great object.

data.v: न जानकी मानववंशनाथ; त्वया सनाथा सुलभा परेण । न चाग्निचूडां ज्वलितामुपेत्य; न दह्यते वीरवरार्ह कश्चित् ।।
data.es: 'O lord of the human race O worthy hero when you are the protector, Janaki cannot be retained by any one easily just as burning fire after it reaches its full height cannot be retained by any one.'
data.anv: मानववंशनाथ O lord of the human race, त्वया by you, सनाथा  protected , जानकी Janaki, परेण by any one, सुलभा easy to obtain, न not, वीर hero, वरार्ह best, ज्वलिताम् blazing, अग्निचूडाम् burning fire, उपेत्य after reaching, कच्छित् any one, न दह्यते (इति) न is not burnt.
data.md: O lord of men, Jānakī, husbanded by you, is not capable of being easily possessed by others. O hero who getting at a flame of fire, does not burn himself?

data.v: सलक्ष्मणं लक्ष्मणमप्रधृष्यं; स्वभावजं वाक्यमुवाच रामः । हितं च पथ्यं च नयप्रसक्तं; ससामधर्मार्थसमाहितं च ।।
data.es: Rama said to Lakshmana, an unassailable warrior with auspicious signs, that what he had spoken was natural, beneficial, wise and useful.It is in accordance with Sama Veda and the science of statecraft, well established in dharma and artha.
data.anv: रामः Rama, सलक्षणम् a man of good signs, अप्रधृष्यम् an unassailable warrior, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, स्वभावजम् natural, हितम् beneficial, पथ्यं च and useful, नयप्रसक्तम् sanctioned by, ससाम conciliatory, धर्मार्थसमाहितं च in accordance with dharma and artha, वाक्यम् these words, उवाच spoke.
data.md: Thereupon Rāma spoke to Lakşmaņa, gifted with royal marks, addressing him with natural and resolute words and saying:—What you had said, is sound, well-meaning, sanctioned by polity and speaks of piety, wealth and forgiveness. It should therefore, without the least doubt, be performed by me. It behoveth me to engage in contemplation about the eternal truth regarding the Deity and in ascetic observances. Oh else O Prince, it is not proper to think of the fruits of a difficult, highly developed and energetic action.

data.v: निःसंशयं कार्यमवेक्षितव्यं; क्रियाविशेषो ह्यनुवर्तितव्यः । ननु प्रवृत्तस्य दुरासदस्य; कुमारकार्यस्य फलं न चिन्त्यम् ।।
data.es: 'My dear, there is no doubt that I have to consider the work (ahead), give special attention to follow up. Surely I need to think over this herculian task and its achievement'.
data.anv: कुमार dear, निस्संशयम् no doubt, कार्यम् the work, अवेक्षितव्यम् should be considered, क्रियाविशेषोऽहि and requires special attention, अनुवर्तितव्यः should be followed, प्रवृत्तस्य (of the work) to be commenced, दुरासदस्य of the unassailable, कार्यस्य of action, फलं च fruit also, चिन्त्यं ननु surely need to think.

data.v: अथ पद्मपलाशाक्षीं मैथिलीमनुचिन्तयन् । उवाच लक्ष्मणं रामो मुखेन परिशुष्यता ।।
data.es: Then falling back on the memory of Maithili, the lady with eyes like lotus petals, he said to Lakshmana with parched lips:
data.anv: अथ then, रामः Rama, पद्मपलाशाक्षीम् lady with eyes like lotus petals, मैथिलीम् Mythili, अनुचिन्तयन् while worrying, परिशुष्यता with dried up, मुखेन with mouth, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, उवाच said
data.md: Thereupon thinking of Maithelee, having eyes resembling lotus-petals, Rāma spoke to Laks mana with dried countenance.

data.v: तर्पयित्वा सहस्राक्षः सलिलेन वसुंधराम् । निर्वर्तयित्वा सस्यानि कृतकर्मा व्यवस्थितः ।।
data.es: 'Having satisfied the earth with abundant rain water and having fulfilled the task of ripening the crops, the thousandeyed Indra has done his duty, has settled down now.
data.anv: सहस्राक्षः thousandeyed Indra, सलिलेन  with water, वसुन्धराम् the earth, तर्पयित्वा having satisfied, सस्यानि crops, निर्वर्तयित्वा  brought  back, कृतकर्मा done his duty, व्यवस्थितः settled down.
data.md: Having satisfied the earth with a profuse discharge of water, produced crops and thus finished his work, the thousand eyed Deity is sitting silent.

data.v: स्निग्धगम्भीरनिर्घोषाः शैलद्रुमपुरोगमाः । विसृज्य सलिलं मेघाः परिश्रान्ता नृपात्मज ।।
data.es: 'O prince having discharged their water the clouds (after the rains) are exhausted. They are moving now over trees and mountains, making deep and pleasant sounds.
data.anv: नृपात्मज prince, स्निग्धगम्भीरनिर्घोषाः with pleasing deep sound, शैलद्रुमपुरोगमाः wandering over trees on the mountains, मेघाः clouds, सलिलम् waters, विसृज्य having showered, परिश्रान्ताः exhausted.
data.md: O son of a king, the clouds, muttering a long and deep sound and approaching the hills and frees, are calmed having discharged their liquid contents.

data.v: नीलोत्पलदलश्यामः श्यामीकृत्वा दिशो दश । विमदा इव मातङ्गाः शान्तवेगाः पयोधराः ।।
data.es: 'The clouds, which were dark till now like the blue lotus petals darkening all the ten directions are like elephants free from all intoxication as their fury is abated৷৷
data.anv: नीलोत्पलदलश्यामा dark like the petals of blue lotuses, पयोधराः rainbearing clouds, दश ten, दिशः directions, श्यामीकृत्वा having filled with darkness, विमदाः devoid of intoxication, मातङ्गाः इव like elephants, शान्तवेगाः became quiet.
data.md: Having made the ten quarters dark blue, the clouds, resembling blue lotuses, have become calm, like to elephants without temporal juice.

data.v: जलगर्भा महावेगाः कुटजार्जुनगन्धिनः । चरित्वा विरताः सौम्य वृष्टिवाताः समुद्यताः ।।
data.es: 'O dear the moist winds have ceased to blow as before and are carrying the fragrance of kutaja and arjuna flowers.
data.anv: सौम्य O dear, जलगर्भाः laden with water, महामेघाः huge clouds, कुटजार्जुनगन्धिनः the fragrance of kutaja and arjuna flowers, समुद्यताः are blowing, वृष्टिवाताः winds carrying rainwater, चरित्वा having moved, विरताः stopped.
data.md: O gentle one, high gales accompanied with rains, big with water and fragrant with Kutaja and Arjuna flowers being driven before hither and thither, have now become silent.

data.v: घनानां वारणानां च मयूराणां च लक्ष्मण । नादः प्रस्रवणानां च प्रशान्तः सहसानघ ।।
data.es: 'O sinless Lakshmana the rumblings of heavy clouds, the trumpeting of elephants, the cry of peacocks and the sound of waterfalls have become suddenly stilled.
data.anv: अनघ O sinless one, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, घनानाम् of heavy clouds, वारणानां च and of elephants, मयूराणां च and peacocks, प्रस्रवणानां च and of waterfalls, नादः sound, सहसा suddenly, प्रशान्तः stopped.
data.md: O innocent Laksmana, the sounds of clouds, elephants, peacocks, and fountains, have been all stopped.

data.v: अभिवृष्टा महामेघैर्निर्मलाश्चित्रसानवः । अनुलिप्ता इवाभान्ति गिरयश्चन्द्ररश्मिभिः ।।
data.es: 'The mountain slopes, having been washed by the showers of rain on all sides, are cleansed. They are shining in variegated colours and look as though the mountain peaks are smeared with glowing colours (of minerals).
data.anv: महामेघैः with huge clouds, अभिवृष्टाः having showered rain, निर्मलाः clean, चित्रसानवः peaks of different colours, गिरयः mountains, चित्रदीप्तिभिः glowing in variegated colours, अनुलिप्ताः इव as if smeared , आभान्ति appear.
data.md: Hills, having variegated summits, being washed by dense clouds and thus free from dirt and impurities, do appear elegant being sprinkled by the rays of the Moon.

data.v: दर्शयन्ति शरन्नद्यः पुलिनानि शनैः शनैः । नवसंगमसव्रीडा जघनानीव योषितः ।।
data.es: 'Just as bashful young brides show their loins slowly during their first sexual meet the rivers start showing their sandy banks slowly in autumn.
data.anv: नवसङ्गमसव्रीडाः bashful of the sexual union with husband for the first time, योषितः young women, जघनानीव their loins, शरन्नद्यः bashful, पुलिनानि sand banks, शनैः शनैः slowly, दर्शयन्ति show.
data.md: The rivers in this season of autumn have been gradually showing their banks.

data.v: प्रसन्नसलिलाः सौम्य कुररीभिर्विनादिताः । चक्रवाकगणाकीर्णा विभान्ति सलिलाशयाः ।।
data.es: 'O gentle Lakshmana the pure water in the tanks and sweet sounds of flocks of female kurari birds and chakravakas there are splendid.
data.anv: सौम्य O gentle Lakshmana, प्रसन्नसलिलाः with pure waters, कुररीभिर्विनादिताः resounded with the singing of female kurari birds, चक्रवाकगणाकीर्णाः with flocks of chakravaka birds, सलिलाशयाः water tanks, विभान्ति are shining.
data.md: O you of excellent looks, the ponds in this season) appear exquisitely fine, being filled with Kurara birds and Cakravākas.

data.v: अन्योन्यबद्धवैराणां जिगीषूणां नृपात्मज । उद्योगसमयः सौम्य पार्थिवानामुपस्थितः ।।
data.es: 'O handsome prince the time has come for making expeditions by kings against the enemies waiting for victory.
data.anv: नृपात्मज O prince, सौम्य O handsome one, अन्योन्यबद्धवैराणाम् having enmity against others, जिगीषूणाम् waiting to be victorious, पार्थिवानाम् of kings, उद्योगसमयः time for expeditions, उपस्थितः has come.
data.md: O son of king, this is the time of preparation for inimical kings, desirous of defeating one another.

data.v: इयं सा प्रथमा यात्रा पार्थिवानां नृपात्मज । न च पश्यामि सुग्रीवमुद्योगं वा तथाविधम् ।।
data.es: 'O prince this is time for the first expedition (of the year) by kings. I do not find Sugriva making effort in that direction.
data.anv: नृपात्मज O prince, इयम् this, पार्थिवानाम् for kings, सा that, प्रथमा यात्रा first expedition, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, तथाविधम् in that manner, उद्योगं वा or effort, न च पश्यामि I do not see.
data.md: O son of king, this is the best time for royal marches, but I do not find Sugrīva preparing himself for that end.

data.v: चत्वारो वार्षिका मासा गता वर्षशतोपमाः । मम शोकाभितप्तस्य सौम्य सीतामपश्यतः ।।
data.es: 'O gentle one, the four months of rainy season are spent without seeing Sita. It is equal to a hundred years for my griefstricken heart.
data.anv: सीताम् Sita, अपश्यतः not seeing, सौम्य O gentle one, शोकाभिभूतस्य caught in grief, मम to me, वर्षशतोपमाः equal to a hundred years, वार्षिकाः rainy, चत्वारः four, मासाः months, गताः are gone.
data.md: Stricken as I am with grief, these four months, the season of rains, appeared to me like a hundred year, not beholding Sītā.

data.v: प्रियाविहीने दुःखार्ते हृतराज्ये विवासिते । कृपां न कुरुते राजा सुग्रीवो मयि लक्ष्मण ।।
data.es: 'O Lakshmana king Sugriva shows no mercy on one, who is griefstricken, separated from his wife, and banished from the kingdom.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana, प्रियाविहीने separated from wife, दुःखार्ते a griefstricken man, हृतराज्ये  lost kingdom, विवासिते banished, मयि at me, राजा सुग्रीवः king Sugriva, कृपाम् mercy, न कुरुते not showing.
data.md: O Laksmana, Sugriva, is not inclined to show any commiseration towards me, who am separated from my beloved spouse, deprived of my kingdom, banished and stricken with sorrow.

data.v: अनाथो हृतराज्योऽयं रावणेन च धर्षितः । दीनो दूरगृहः कामी मां चैव शरणं गतः ।।
data.es: 'O gentle one although I am a vanquisher of foes, this evilminded king of monkeys is slighting me because I am away from home, I have lost my kingdom, I am outraged by Ravana, I am miserable and lovesick and I have sought his help.
data.anv: सौम्य gentle, परन्तप vanquisher of foes, अयम् this person, अनाथः helpless, हृतराज्यः lost  kingdom, दीनः miserable, दूरगृहः away from home, रावणेन च,by Ravana, धर्षितः outraged,कामी lovesick, मां चैव me also, शरणं गतः sought help, इत्येतैः by these, कारणैः with reasons, दुरात्मनः of the evilminded, वानरराजस्य of the king of monkeys, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva's, अहम् I am, परिभूतः slighted.
data.md: Regarding me as one without any to back him, deprived of his kingdom, insulted my Rāvaņa, wretched, of a distant land, under the influence of amour and therefore seeking his help, (Sugrīva has not felt pity for me).

data.v: इत्येतैः कारणैः सौम्य सुग्रीवस्य दुरात्मनः । अहं वानरराजस्य परिभूतः परंतप ।।
data.es: 'O gentle one although I am a vanquisher of foes, this evilminded king of monkeys is slighting me because I am away from home, I have lost my kingdom, I am outraged by Ravana, I am miserable and lovesick and I have sought his help.
data.anv: सौम्य gentle, परन्तप vanquisher of foes, अयम् this person, अनाथः helpless, हृतराज्यः lost  kingdom, दीनः miserable, दूरगृहः away from home, रावणेन च,by Ravana, धर्षितः outraged,कामी lovesick, मां चैव me also, शरणं गतः sought help, इत्येतैः by these, कारणैः with reasons, दुरात्मनः of the evilminded, वानरराजस्य of the king of monkeys, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva's, अहम् I am, परिभूतः slighted.
data.md: O subduer of foes, O you of excellent looks, for these reasons, I have been insulted by that vicious-souled king of monkeys-Sugriva.

data.v: स कालं परिसंख्याय सीतायाः परिमार्गणे । कृतार्थः समयं कृत्वा दुर्मतिर्नावबुध्यते ।।
data.es: 'The evilminded Sugriva, having fulfilled his objective, does not realise that he has made a promise to me and has reached the time set for the search of Sita.
data.anv: दुर्मतिः evilminded, सः he, कृतार्थः fulfilled his objective, सीतायाः Sita's, परिमार्गणे in search of, कालम् time, परिसङ्ख्याय having failed, समयम् promise, कृत्वा made, नाव बुध्यते does not realise it.
data.md: Having appointed the time time to institute enquiries about Sītā, that wicked-minded one has now forgot it on the accession of his new dignity.

data.v: त्वं प्रविश्य च किष्किन्धां ब्रूहि वानरपुंगवम् । मूर्खं ग्राम्य सुखे सक्तं सुग्रीवं वचनान्मम ।।
data.es: 'Go to Kishkinda and speak (on my behalf ) to that fool, Sugriva, the chief of monkeys who is revelling in habitual sensual pleasures
data.anv: किष्किन्धाम् into Kishkinda, प्रविश्य entering, वानरपुङ्गवम् chief of monkeys, मूर्खम् fool, ग्राम्यसुखे native pleasures, सक्तम्  is engaged, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, मम my, वचनात् words, ब्रूहि tell him.
data.md: Do you therefore repair to Kişkindhā and speak of me to that stupid lord of monkeys Sugriva, addicted to rural enjoyments.

data.v: अर्थिनामुपपन्नानां पूर्वं चाप्युपकारिणाम् । आशां संश्रुत्य यो हन्ति स लोके पुरुषाधमः ।।
data.es: 'He who, having promised to his friend to grant his desire and who, having been obliged, fails to implement the promise, is the lowest on earth.
data.anv: उपपन्नानाम् approached, पूर्वम् earlier, उपकारिणां च and  who has helped, अर्थिनाम् the one who requested , संश्रुत्य with regard to, आशाम् hopes, यः he who, हन्ति disappoints, सः he, लोके on the earth, पुरुषाधम: lowest among men.
data.md: And do you tell him-'He, who breaks his promise made to a powerful benefactor who solicits his favour, is regarded by people as vile.

data.v: शुभं वा यदि वा पापं यो हि वाक्यमुदीरितम् । सत्येन परिगृह्णाति स वीरः पुरुषोत्तमः ।।
data.es: '(On the other hand) he who honours his promise, whether good or bad, is truly heroic, the best of men.'
data.anv: यः हि he who, शुभं वा good or, यदि वा or else, पापम् sin, उदीरितम् which has been promised, वाक्यम् words, सत्येन truly, प्रतिगृह्णाति will follow, सः वीरः he is a hero, पुरुषोत्तमः  the best of men.
data.md: He is a true hero and an excellent person who verifies his words whether good or bad.

data.v: कृतार्था ह्यकृतार्थानां मित्राणां न भवन्ति ये । तान्मृतानपि क्रव्यादः कृतघ्नान्नोपभुञ्जते ।।
data.es: 'Even the carnivorous animals dislike to eat the body of such ungrateful men who do not help their friends even though they have received help and have achieved their objective.'
data.anv: कृतार्थाः one who has achieved his objective, ये whoever, अकृतार्थानाम् of the needy man, मित्राणाम् to the friends, न भवन्ति not help, मृतान् after death, कृतघ्नान् ungrateful people, तान् them, क्रव्यादाः अपि even by carnivorous animals, न उपभुञ्जते not like to eat.
data.md: Ungrateful they are who do not, after attaining their ends, engage in the service of those of their friends who have not accomplished their objects; even those living on raw flesh do not feed on their gore after their death.

data.v: नूनं काञ्चनपृष्ठस्य विकृष्टस्य मया रणे । द्रष्टुमिच्छन्ति चापस्य रूपं विद्युद्गणोपमम् ।।
data.es: 'Surely he wishes to see the form of my bow inlaid with gold bent by me to its full length, looking like a streak of lightning.
data.anv: नूनम् surely, काञ्चनपृष्ठस्य inlaid with gold, रणे in war, मया by me, विकृष्टस्य when bent, चापस्य bow's, विद्युद्गणोपमम्  like a streak of lightning, रूपम् form, द्रष्टुम् to see, इच्छसि desires.
data.md: And ask him if he wishes to behold in battlefield the golden bow resembling a lightning.

data.v: घोरं ज्यातलनिर्घोषं क्रुद्धस्य मम संयुगे । निर्घोषमिव वज्रस्य पुनः संश्रोतुमिच्छति ।।
data.es: 'Perhaps he wants once again to hear when enraged in a combat, the dreadful twang of my bow, resembling the peal of a thunderbolt .
data.anv: संयुगे in the combat, क्रुद्धस्य of the enraged, मम my, वज्रस्य thunderbolt's, निर्घोषमिव like the terrific sound, घोरम् dreadful, ज्यातलनिर्घोषम् twang of the bow string, पुनः again, संश्रोतुम् to hear, इच्छसि  wants.
data.md: And ask him more, if he wishes to hear the terrible twang of my bow resembling the noise of thunder, when I am enraged in battle.

data.v: काममेवंगतेऽप्यस्य परिज्ञाते पराक्रमे । त्वत्सहायस्य मे वीर न चिन्ता स्यान्नृपात्मज ।।
data.es: 'O prince knowing my valour fully welI, and knowing that you are here to help me he is unhesitatingly revelling in sensual pleasures.
data.anv: वीर a hero, नृपात्मज prince, अस्य his, परिज्ञाते knowing fully, पराक्रमे my valour, काम् एवं गतेऽपि  revelling in sensual pleasures, त्वत्सहायस्य when you are with me to help, मे my, चिन्ता worry, न स्यात् has no .
data.md: O hero, O son of a king, when apprised of my prowess assisted by you, will he not recapitulate in his mind (that he may be destroyed by us like to Vali)?

data.v: यदर्थमयमारम्भः कृतः परपुरंजय । समयं नाभिजानाति कृतार्थः प्लवगेश्वरः ।।
data.es: 'O conqueror of the enemy capital the monkey lord who has achieved his goal does not realise the importance of my mission.
data.anv: परपुरञ्जयः one who can conquer the enemy's capital, यदर्थम् what for, अयम् this, आरम्भः effort, कृतः one who made, समयम् promise कृतार्थः one who has achieved his goal, प्लवगेश्वरः king of monkeys, नाभिजानाति does not realise.
data.md: O conqueror of enemies' cities, does not that lord of monkeys, after accomplishing his object, think of the conditions under which our friendship was contracted?

data.v: वर्षासमयकालं तु प्रतिज्ञाय हरीश्वरः । व्यतीतांश्चतुरो मासान्विहरन्नावबुध्यते ।।
data.es: 'Having promised (to search for Sita) after the rainy season,Sugriva is not aware that he has (already) spent the four monthsrevelling.
data.anv: हरीश्वरः Sugriva, वर्षासमयकालम् in the rainy season, प्रतिज्ञाय having sworn, विहरन्  revelling, व्यतीतान् spent, चतुरः four, मासान् months, नावबुध्यते he is not aware.
data.md: Does not that lord of monkeys think that he has spent four months in enjoyments, having promised and appointed the season, after rains, (for making) enquiries about Sītā?

data.v: सामात्यपरिषत्क्रीडन्पानमेवोपसेवते । शोकदीनेषु नास्मासु सुग्रीवः कुरुते दयाम् ।।
data.es: 'Sporting with the council of ministers surrounding him, resorting to drinking, he shows no compassion to us feeling wretched with grief.
data.anv: सुग्रीवः Sugriva, सामात्यपरिषत् with the council of ministers, क्रीडन् sporting, पानमेव in drinking only, उपसेवते resorting to, शोकदीनेषु wretched with sorrow, अस्मासु at us, दयाम् compassion, न कुरुते is showing.
data.md: Does not Sugrīva feel pity for us, who are racked with sorrow, being addicted to drinking with friends and counsellors?

data.v: उच्यतां गच्छ सुग्रीवस्त्वया वत्स महाबल । मम रोषस्य यद्रूपं ब्रूयाश्चैनमिदं वचः ।।
data.es: 'O mighty warrior O dear, go to Sugriva and make him aware of the virulence of my anger and tell him:
data.anv: महाबल mighty, वीर warrior, गच्छ go, त्वया by you, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, मम my, रोषस्य about my anger, यत् such, रूपम् form, उच्यताम् make him know, एवम् that way, इदम् this, वचः word, वत्स dear, ब्रूया: tell.
data.md: Do you go, O hero, O you of mighty strength and relate to Sugrīva these my angry words.

data.v: न च संकुचितः पन्था येन वाली हतो गतः । समये तिष्ठ सुग्रीवमा वालिपथमन्वगाः ।।
data.es: 'The route by which Vali departed, killed by me has not been closed. O Sugriva you ought to abide by the pledge given. Do not follow the path of Vali.
data.anv: सुग्रीव Sugriva, समये as per pledge, तिष्ठ  abide, हतः killed, वाली Vali, येन by the root, गतः had gone, पन्थाः path, न च सङ्कुचितः is not a narrow one, वालिपथम् Vali's path, मा अन्वगाः you do not follow.
data.md: The way that has been wended by the slain Vali, is not yet narrowed. Do you, O Sugriva, desist in time: do not walk in the wake of Vāli.

data.v: एक एव रणे वाली शरेण निहतो मया । त्वां तु सत्यादतिक्रान्तं हनिष्यामि सबान्धवम् ।।
data.es: 'Vali was killed by me in the battle with a single arrow while I shall kill you now along with your near and dear ones since you have deviated from the truth.'
data.anv: मया by me, रणे in a combat, शरेण by an arrow, एकः one, वाली एव Vali alone, हतः killed, सत्यात् from the truth, अतिक्रान्तम् deviated from the truth, त्वां तु you also, सबान्धवम् along with your near and dear, हनिष्यामि I will kill.
data.md: I killed Vāli only with my shaft in the battlefield; but if you did deviate from the path of truth I shall destroy you along with your kinsmen and relatives.

data.v: तदेवं विहिते कार्ये यद्धितं पुरुषर्षभ । तत्तद्ब्रूहि नरश्रेष्ठ त्वर कालव्यतिक्रमः ।।
data.es: 'O bull among men O hero speak to him that all that is done in time is done well. Hurry up. Ask him to do whatever is good for him as well as for us:
data.anv: पुरुषर्षभ O bull among men, नरश्रेष्ट O king among monkeys, तत् therefore, कार्ये in the task, एवम् in this way, विहिते when carried out, यत् all that, हितम् is good, तत् all that, ब्रूहि tell, त्वर be quick, कालव्यतिक्रमः time is passing.
data.md: O you best of men, do you speedily relate to him all those benefits which we shall reap by his actions, for the proper season is well-nigh past.

data.v: कुरुष्व सत्यं मयि वानरेश्वर; प्रतिश्रुतं धर्ममवेक्ष्य शाश्वतम् । मा वालिनं प्रेत्य गतो यमक्षयं; त्वमद्य पश्येर्मम चोदितैः शरैः ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys Carry out the promise you made to me, consider it to be eternal dharma. Slain by my arrows, you will see Vali in the abode of the lord of death.'
data.anv: वानरेश्वर O king among monkeys, शाश्वतम् eternal, धर्मम् dharma, अवेक्ष्य following, मम my, प्रतिश्रुतम् promise, सत्यम् truth, कुरुष्व  doing, अद्य now, त्वम् you, मयि my, शरैः by arrows, चोदितै: hit by, प्रेत्य  killed, यमक्षयम् abode of Yama, गतः gone, वालिनम् Vali, मा पश्येः will see.
data.md: O best of monkeys, do you carry out your promise remembering the eternal existence of virtue. Do you not behold the spirit of Väli in the abode of Death, being killed by the shaft discharged by me.

data.v: स पूर्वजं तीव्रविवृद्धकोपं; लालप्यमानं प्रसमीक्ष्य दीनम् । चकार तीव्रां मतिमुग्रतेजा; हरीश्वरमानववंशनाथः ।।
data.es: On seeing Rama, the protector of the human race, wailing Lakshmana of terrific lustre hardened his stand against Sugriva and proceeded, charged with intense anger.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये किष्किन्धाकाण्डे त्रिंशस्सर्गःThus ends the thirtieth sarga of Kishkindakanda of the Holy Ramayana, the first epic, composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: मानववंशनाथः protector of the human race, उग्रतेजाः terrific lustre, सः he (Lakshmana), तीव्रविवृद्धकोपम् very angry, दीनम् piteous, लालप्यमानम् wailing, पूर्वजम् elder brother, प्रसमीक्ष्य on seeing, हरीश्वरे at Sugriva, तीव्रम् intense, मतिम् in mind, चकार went.
data.md: Beholding his elder brother thus enraged and bewailing, the fiery-spirited Laksmana, the best of men, became enraged with Sugrīva.

data.v: स कामिनं दीनमदीनसत्त्वः; शोकाभिपन्नं समुदीर्णकोपम् । नरेन्द्रसूनुर्नरदेवपुत्रं; रामानुजः पूर्वजमित्युवाच ।।
data.es: Seeing the indomitable hero, his elder brother, son of a king, lovesick, dejected and overcome by anger and grief, spoke prince Lakshmana:
data.anv: नरेन्द्रसूनुः son of a king, सः he, रामानुजः Rama's younger brother, कामिनम् lovesick, दीनम् dejected, अदीनसत्त्वम् indomitable hero, शोकाभिपन्नम् overcome by grief, समुदीर्णकोपम् very angry, नरदेवपुत्रम् son of lord of the people, अग्रजम् elder brother, इति this, उवाच spoke.
data.md: Lakşmaņa again addressed his high-minded elder brother, the son of a king, influenced by passion, stricken with grief, and poorly, with the following words.

data.v: न वानरः स्थास्यति साधुवृत्ते; न मंस्यते कार्यफलानुषङ्गान् । न भक्ष्यते वानरराज्यलक्ष्मीं; तथा हि नाभिक्रमतेऽस्य बुद्धिः ।।
data.es: 'Sugriva has not stuck to the conduct of the virtuous, of sharing the fruits of action equally. He does not realize that he obtained the prosperous kingship of vanaras as a result of your (friendly) action. He does not have the intelligence of conducting himself in your favour (of searching Sita). Therefore he will not enjoy the kingship for long.
data.anv: वानरः monkey (Sugriva), साधुवृत्ते well conducted, स्थास्यति abide, कर्मफलानुषङ्गान् sharing fruits of action equally, मंस्यते not recognised, वानरराज्यलक्ष्मीम् prosperous kingship of the monkeys, न भोज्यते not enjoy, तथाहि hence, अस्य his, बुद्धिः intellect, नाभिक्रमते not conducted in our favour (search of Sita)
data.md: That monkey shall not follow the actions of the pious, shall not think of the great fruit (the accession of kingdom) reaped by our friendship; kingdom because he has not the right understanding to make good his promise.

data.v: मतिक्षयाद्ग्राम्यसुखेषु सक्त;स्तव प्रसादाप्रतिकारबुद्धिः । हतोऽग्रजं पश्यतु वालिनं स; न राज्यमेवं विगुणस्य देयम् ।।
data.es: 'O hero he is too ungrateful to return the favour done to him, Engaged in rustic, vulgar pleasures, he is not thinking of it. Let him see his killed elder brother. Kingship should not be given to an individual who is a destitute of virtues.
data.anv: वीर hero, तव your, प्रसादाप्रतिकारबुद्धिः ingratitude to the benefactor, मतिक्षयात् mind grown smaller, ग्राम्यसुखेषु in rustic, vulgar pleasures, सक्तः engaged, हतः killed, अग्रजम् elder brother, तस्य his, पश्यतु let him see, एवम् that way, विगुणस्य desttitute of virtues, राज्यम् kingdom, न देयम् not to be given.
data.md: Owing to the wane of his understanding in consequence of your favour he is addicted to rural enjoyments and has forgot to return your benefits. O hero, killed let him espy his elder brother Vāli. It is not proper to confer kingdom upon that wicked-minded one.

data.v: न धारये कोपमुदीर्णवेगं; निहन्मि सुग्रीवमसत्यमद्य । हरिप्रवीरैः सह वालिपुत्रो; नरेन्द्रपत्न्या विचयं करोतु ।।
data.es: 'I cannot hold my overflowing anger. I shall kill this untruthful Sugriva. Let Vali's son along with the foremost of monkeys search for the queen (Sita).'
data.anv: उदीर्णवेगम् overflow, कोपम् anger, न धारये I do not hold, अद्य now, असत्यम् untruthful, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, निहन्मि kill, वालिपुत्रः Vali's son, हरिप्रवीरैः with foremost of monkeys, सह along with, नरेन्द्रपत्न्याः queen, विचयम् search, करोतु let him make.
data.md: I am unable to bear the outburst of my ire forsooth shall I kill today, that liar Sugrīva. May the son of Vāli with other principal monkeys engage in quest of that daughter of a king.

data.v: तमात्तबाणासनमुत्पतन्तं; निवेदितार्थं रणचण्डकोपम् । उवच रामः परवीरहन्ता; स्ववेक्षितं सानुनयं च वाक्यम् ।।
data.es: Rama, a slayer of enemy heroes but not of those who seek his refuge, spoke in a conciliatory tone to Lakshmana who jumped, wielding bow and arrows, inspired with his fierce fighting spirit.
data.anv: परवीरहन्ता a slayer of enemy heroes, रामः Rama, निवेदितार्थम् who seek refuge, रणचण्डकोपम् fierce in war, आत्तबाणासनम् wielding bow and arrow, उत्पतन्तम् suddenly standing up, तम् him, स्ववेक्षितम् his own angle of vision, सानुनयं च in a conciliatory tone, वाक्यम् these words, उवाच spoke.
data.md: Beholding him rise up from the seat with bow in his hand and greatly wrought up with anger and hearing him thus announce his intention about the destruction of Sugriva, Rama, the slayer of foes, spoke to him the following humble words worthy of being spoken on that occasion.

data.v: न हि वै त्वद्विधो लोके पापमेवं समाचरेत् । पापमार्येण यो हन्ति स वीरः पुरुषोत्तमः ।।
data.anv: त्वद्विधः a man like you, लोके in the world, एवम् in this way, पापम् sin, न समाचरेत् not commit, यः whoever, आर्येण of noble attitude, (कोपम् anger), हन्ति kills, सः वीरः such a hero, पुरुषोत्तमः best of men

data.v: नेदमद्य त्वया ग्राह्यं साधुवृत्तेन लक्ष्मण । तां प्रीतिमनुवर्तस्व पूर्ववृत्तं च संगतम् ।।
data.es: 'O Lakshmana with your good conduct you should not do so. Keeping in view the affectionate friendship extended (by Sugriva) earlier, be friendly.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, साधुवृत्तेन with good conduct, त्वया by you, अत्र here, इदम् thus, ग्राह्यम् keeping, ताम् that, प्रीतिम् affection, पूर्ववृत्तम् as earlier, सङ्गतं च also friendship, अनुवर्तस्व follow.
data.md: Persons like you on this earth do not perpetrate the crime of destroying their friends. He is truly a great hero and an excellent person who subdues anger by his right understanding, O Lakṣmaṇa, it is not proper for you to bring about the destruction of your friend, do you follow your former friendship and good feelings.

data.v: सामोपहितया वाचा रूक्षाणि परिवर्जयन् । वक्तुमर्हसि सुग्रीवं व्यतीतं कालपर्यये ।।
data.es: 'Sugriva has exceeded the time limit. Avoiding harsh words, you ought to speak to him in a conciliatory manner.
data.anv: कालपर्यये not attempting timely action, व्यतीतम् who exceeded, सुग्रीवम् to Sugriva, रूक्षाणि harsh, परिवर्जयन् avoiding, सामोपहितया adopting conciliating, वाचा with word, वक्तुम् to speak, अर्हसि proper for you.
data.md: Avoiding harsh words do you address Sugrīva, who has violated his promise, with soothing words.

data.v: सोऽ ग्रजेनानुशिष्टार्थो यथावत्पुरुषर्षभः । प्रविवेश पुरीं वीरो लक्ष्मणः परवीरहा ।।
data.es: Having been duly briefed by his elder brother, the heroic Lakshmana, destroyer of enemies, a bull among men entered the city.
data.anv: अग्रजेन by the elder brother, यथावत् duly, अनुशिष्टार्थः briefed, पुरुषर्षभः bull among men, परवीरहा destroyer of enemies, वीरः hero, सः लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, पुरीम् city, प्रविवेश entered.
data.md: Being thus duly counselled by his elder brother, that best of men, the heroic Laks maņa-the slayer of foes, entered the city.

data.v: ततः शुभमतिः प्राज्ञो भ्रातुः प्रियहिते रतः । लक्ष्मणः प्रतिसंरब्धो जगाम भवनं कपेः ।।
data.es: The noblehearted, benevolent and wise Lakshmana, eager to please Rama, picked up his bow looking like a mountain peak, comparable to the bow of Indra and agitated with the anger of the god of Death entered the mansion of Sugriva which stood like the mountain peak of Mandara.
data.anv: ततः then, शुभमतिः good hearted man, प्राज्ञ: wise man, प्रियहिते benevolent person, रतः involved, प्रतिसम्रब्धः eager to please, कालान्तकोपमः resembling the anger of the god of death, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, शक्रबाणासनप्रख्यम् comparable to the bow of Indra, गिरिशृङ्गाभम् like a mountain peak, धनुः bow, प्रगृह्य holding, मन्दरः Mandara, सानुमानिव like mountain peak, कपेः monkey's, भवनम् to the mansion, जगाम went.
data.md: Thereupon the highly intelligent Lakşmaņa of right understanding, and ever intent upon the welfare of his brother, taking up a bow like to Indra's, resembling the summit of a hill and terrible as Death himself, entered, wrought up with ire, the abode of the king of monkeys like the hill Mandāra.

data.v: शक्रबाणासनप्रख्यं धनुः कालान्तकोपमः । प्रगृह्य गिरिशृङ्गाभं मन्दरः सानुमानिव ।।
data.es: The noblehearted, benevolent and wise Lakshmana, eager to please Rama, picked up his bow looking like a mountain peak, comparable to the bow of Indra and agitated with the anger of the god of Death entered the mansion of Sugriva which stood like the mountain peak of Mandara.
data.anv: ततः then, शुभमतिः good hearted man, प्राज्ञ: wise man, प्रियहिते benevolent person, रतः involved, प्रतिसम्रब्धः eager to please, कालान्तकोपमः resembling the anger of the god of death, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, शक्रबाणासनप्रख्यम् comparable to the bow of Indra, गिरिशृङ्गाभम् like a mountain peak, धनुः bow, प्रगृह्य holding, मन्दरः Mandara, सानुमानिव like mountain peak, कपेः monkey's, भवनम् to the mansion, जगाम went.
data.md: Thereupon the highly intelligent Lakşmaņa of right understanding, and ever intent upon the welfare of his brother, taking up a bow like to Indra's, resembling the summit of a hill and terrible as Death himself, entered, wrought up with ire, the abode of the king of monkeys like the hill Mandāra.

data.v: यथोक्तकारी वचनमुत्तरं चैव सोत्तरम् । बृहस्पतिसमो बुद्ध्या मत्त्वा रामानुजस्तदा ।।
data.es: Then Lakshmana, obedient, intelligent like Brihaspati, like a tempest, encompassed by the fire of anger and deliberating in his mind as to the possible questions from Sugriva and the reply from him.
data.anv: तदा then, यथोक्तकारी obedient, रामानुजः Rama's younger brother, भ्रातुः brother's, कामक्रोधसमुत्थेन inspired by love and anger, कोपाग्निना by the fire of anger, वृतः encompassed, अप्रीतः displeased, बुद्ध्या in his mind, बृहस्पतिसमः like Brihaspati, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, सोत्तरम् answer to be given, उत्तरं वचनम् words of reply, मत्वा thinking over, तदा then, प्रभञ्जन इव like stormy wind, प्रययौ marched.
data.md: Intelligent like Bșhaspati and ever abiding by his elder brother's behest, Laksmana, revolving in his mind what he should say as well as Sugrīva's answers, and enveloped with the fire of anger arising from the excitement of his brother's amour, and therefore displeased, proceeded quick as air.

data.v: कामक्रोधसमुत्थेन भ्रातुः कोपाग्निना वृतः । प्रभञ्जन इवाप्रीतः प्रययौ लक्ष्मणस्तदा ।।
data.es: Then Lakshmana, obedient, intelligent like Brihaspati, like a tempest, encompassed by the fire of anger and deliberating in his mind as to the possible questions from Sugriva and the reply from him.
data.anv: तदा then, यथोक्तकारी obedient, रामानुजः Rama's younger brother, भ्रातुः brother's, कामक्रोधसमुत्थेन inspired by love and anger, कोपाग्निना by the fire of anger, वृतः encompassed, अप्रीतः displeased, बुद्ध्या in his mind, बृहस्पतिसमः like Brihaspati, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, सोत्तरम् answer to be given, उत्तरं वचनम् words of reply, मत्वा thinking over, तदा then, प्रभञ्जन इव like stormy wind, प्रययौ marched.
data.md: Intelligent like Bșhaspati and ever abiding by his elder brother's behest, Laksmana, revolving in his mind what he should say as well as Sugrīva's answers, and enveloped with the fire of anger arising from the excitement of his brother's amour, and therefore displeased, proceeded quick as air.

data.v: सालतालाश्वकर्णांश्च तरसा पातयन्बहून् । पर्यस्यन्गिरिकूटानि द्रुमानन्यांश्च वेगतः ।।
data.es: 'Lakshmana rushed on foot speedily, cutting the branches of sala, tala and asvakarna and other trees on the way and forcibly turning and crushing the mountain rocks into pieces with a single foot, like a swiftmoving elephant taking long strides, to carry out the task.
data.anv: आशुगः swift, गज इव like an elephant, वेगतः speedily, तरसा vigorously, सालतालाश्वकर्णांश्च sala, tala, and asvakarna, पातयन् felling trees, अन्यान् and others, द्रुमांश्च trees, गिरिकूटानि mountain rocks, बलात् forcibly, पर्यस्यन् turning them, पद्भ्याम् with his feet, शिलाः rocks, शकलीकुर्वन् breaking to pieces, दूरम् a distance, एकपदे with one foot, त्यक्त्वा pushing, कार्यवशात् to carry out the task, द्रुतम् quickly, ययौ went.

data.v: शिलाश्च शकलीकुर्वन्पद्भ्यां गज इवाशुगः । दूरमेकपदं त्यक्त्वा ययौ कार्यवशाद्द्रुतम् ।।
data.es: 'Lakshmana rushed on foot speedily, cutting the branches of sala, tala and asvakarna and other trees on the way and forcibly turning and crushing the mountain rocks into pieces with a single foot, like a swiftmoving elephant taking long strides, to carry out the task.
data.anv: आशुगः swift, गज इव like an elephant, वेगतः speedily, तरसा vigorously, सालतालाश्वकर्णांश्च sala, tala, and asvakarna, पातयन् felling trees, अन्यान् and others, द्रुमांश्च trees, गिरिकूटानि mountain rocks, बलात् forcibly, पर्यस्यन् turning them, पद्भ्याम् with his feet, शिलाः rocks, शकलीकुर्वन् breaking to pieces, दूरम् a distance, एकपदे with one foot, त्यक्त्वा pushing, कार्यवशात् to carry out the task, द्रुतम् quickly, ययौ went.
data.md: And on he proceeded, felling down by his velocity, Sāla, Tāla, and Aśvakarņa trees, throwing aside the mountain summits and other trees, breaking rocks into pieces with his feet and striding very quickly like to a fleet-coursing elephant.

data.v: तामपश्यद्बलाकीर्णां हरिराजमहापुरीम् । दुर्गामिक्ष्वाकुशार्दूलः किष्किन्धां गिरिसंकटे ।।
data.es: The tiger of the Ikshvaku race saw the inaccessible Kishkinda, the capital of vanara kingdom, located between mountains and fortified with the army.
data.anv: इक्ष्वाकुशार्दूलः tiger of the Ikshvaku race, गिरिसङ्कटे in between the mountains, बलाकीर्णाम् filled by the army, दुर्गाम् inaccessible, हरिराजमहापुरीम् vanara king's capital city, ताम् that, किष्किन्धाम् Kishkinda, अपश्यत् saw.
data.md: And that best of Ikşwakus, beheld that splendid city of the king of monkeys hard to enter, surrounded by monkey-herds, and mountains.

data.v: रोषात्प्रस्फुरमाणौष्ठः सुग्रीवं प्रति कल्ष्मणः । ददर्श वानरान्भीमान्किष्किन्धाया बहिश्चरान् ।।
data.es: His lips trembling in anger, Lakshmana saw fierceful monkey guards of Sugriva at the entrance of Kishkinda city.
data.anv: सुग्रीवम् प्रति Sugriva in turn, रोषात् due to anger, प्रस्फुरमाणोष्ठः lips trembling, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, किष्किन्धायाः Kishkinda's, बहिश्चरान् front guards, भीमान् fierceful ones, वानरान् monkeys, ददर्श saw.
data.md: And having his lips swollen with anger for Sugrīva, Lakşmaņa beheld the terrible monkeys walking outside the city.

data.v: शैलशृङ्गाणि शतशः प्रवृद्धांश्च महीरुहान् । जगृहुः कुञ्जरप्रख्या वानराः पर्वतान्तरे ।।
data.es: Hundreds of monkeys of the size of elephants stood holding huge trees and boulders of rocks on seeing Lakshmana, the bull among men.
data.anv: पर्वतान्तरे in between the mountains, कुञ्जरप्रख्याः comparable to elephants in size, सर्वे all, वानराः monkeys, पुरुषर्षभम् bull among men, तं लक्ष्मणम् that Lakshmana, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, शतशः in hundreds, शैलशृङ्गाणि boulders of rocks, प्रवृद्धान् fully grown, महीरुहान् च huge trees, जगृहुः seized.
data.md: Beholding that best of men-Laksmana, the monkeys resembling elephants entered the mountainous stronghold and took up the summits of the hill and huge trees.

data.v: तान्गृहीतप्रहरणान्हरीन्दृष्ट्वा तु लक्ष्मणः । बभूव द्विगुणं क्रुद्धो बह्विन्धन इवानलः ।।
data.es: On seeing the monkeys wielding weapons, Lakshmana's anger doubled like logs of firewood put to burning.
data.anv: लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, गृहीतप्रहरणान् seized weapons, तान् them, हरीन् monkeys, दृष्ट्वा on seeing, बह्विन्धनः lots of firewood, अनलः इव like fire, द्विगुणम् doubled, क्रुद्धः angry, बभूव became.
data.md: And observing them armed, Lakṣmaṇa was doubly inflamed with anger like to fire kindled with fuels.

data.v: तं ते भयपरीताङ्गाः क्रुद्धं दृष्ट्वा प्लवंगमाः । कालमृत्युयुगान्ताभं शतशो विद्रुता दिशः ।।
data.es: Seeing enraged Lakshmana, who looked like a veritable god of Death at the time of dissolution of the universe, hundreds of monkeys, their limbs trembling in fear ran in different directions.
data.anv: शतशः in hundreds, ते they, प्लवङ्गमाः monkeys, क्रुद्धम्  enraged, कालमृत्युयुगान्ताभम् seemed like the god of death at the end of creation, तम् him, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, भयपरीताङ्गाः limbs shaking in fear, दिशः directions, विद्रुताः fled.
data.md: Beholding Lakṣmaṇa, highly enraged, terrible as Death himself at the time of dissolution, the monkeys, stricken with fear, fled away, by hundreds, into various quarters.

data.v: ततः सुग्रीवभवनं प्रविश्य हरिपुंगवाः । क्रोधमागमनं चैव लक्ष्मणस्य न्यवेदयन् ।।
data.es: Having entered Sugriva's palace, the monkeychiefs reported the arrival of angry Lakshmana.
data.anv: ततः then, हरिपुङ्गवा: monkeychiefs, सुग्रीवभवनम् to Sugriva's mansion, प्रविश्य having entered, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, आगमनम् about the arrival, क्रोधं चैव and his anger, न्यवेदयन् reported.
data.md: Thereat those foremost of monkeys, entering the palace of Sugrīva, communicated to him, Laksmana's ire and approach.

data.v: तारया सहितः कामी सक्तः कपिवृषो रहः । न तेषां कपिवीराणां शुश्राव वचनं तदा ।।
data.es: But Sugriva who was engrossed in overtures with passionate Tara, did not heed the words of the monkeychiefs.
data.anv: तदा then, कामी passionate, तारया with Tara, सहितः along with, रहः in privy, सक्तः engrossed in love, कपिवृषः bull among monkeys, तेषाम् their, कपिवीराणाम् of the monkeychiefs, वचनम् words, न शुश्राव not heed.
data.md: That amorous chief of monkeys, attached to Tārā, paid no heed to the words of those foremost of monkeys.

data.v: ततः सचिवसंदिष्टा हरयो रोमहर्षणाः । गिरिकुञ्जरमेघाभा नगर्या निर्ययुस्तदा ।।
data.es: Commanded by the ministers, the monkeys who looked like fierce mountains, elephants and clouds that caused horripilation, left the place at once.
data.anv: ततः then, रोमहर्षणाः who causes horripilation, गिरिकुञ्जरमेघाभाः fierceful like the mountains, elephants and clouds, हरयः the monkeys, सचिवसन्दिष्टाः commaded by the ministers, तदा then, नगरात् from the city, निर्ययुः they left.
data.md: Thereupon those terrible monkeys, resembling hills, elephants and clouds, went out of the city being commanded by the minister.

data.v: नखदंष्ट्रायुधा घोराः सर्वे विकृतदर्शनाः । सर्वे शार्दूलदर्पाश्च सर्वे च विकृताननाः ।।
data.es: The monkeys, their faces, deformed, their nails and teeth like weapons were dreadful and horrifying in appearance, proud as tigers
data.anv: घोरा: dreadful, नखदंष्ट्रायुधाः nails and teeth as weapons, सर्वे all, विकृतदर्शनाः horrifying to look, सर्वे all, शार्दूलदर्पा: proud as tigers, सर्वे च and all, विकृताननाः of deformed faces.

data.v: दशनागबलाः केचित्केचिद्दशगुणोत्तराः । केचिन्नागसहस्रस्य बभूवुस्तुल्यविक्रमाः ।।
data.es: Of them some possessed the strength of ten, some a hundred and some a thousand elephants. All of them were of equal valour.
data.anv: केचित् some, दशनागबलाः possessed the strength of ten elephants, केचित् some, दशगुणोत्तराः of a hundred elephants in strength, केचित् some, नागसहस्रस्य of a thousand elephants in strength, तुल्यविक्रमाः equal in valour, बभूवुः were.

data.v: कृत्स्नां हि कपिभिर्व्याप्तां द्रुमहस्तैर्महाबलैः । अपश्यल्लक्ष्मणः क्रुद्धः किष्किन्धां तां दुरासदम् ।।
data.es: Enraged Lakshmana saw the huge inacccessible city of Kishkinda filled with mighty strong and fierce monkeys holding trees in hand.
data.anv: कृत्स्नां entire palace, क्रुद्धः angry, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, द्रुमहस्तै: holding trees in hands, महाबलैः mighty strong, कपिभिः monkeys, व्याप्ताम् huge, दुरासदाम् inaccessible, तां किष्किन्धाम् that Kishkinda, अपश्यत् saw.
data.md: Thereupon Laksmana, angry, espied the city of Kiskindhă, hard to enter and surrounded by mighty monkeys with trees in their hands.

data.v: ततस्ते हरयः सर्वे प्राकारपरिखान्तरात् । निष्क्रम्योदग्रसत्त्वास्तु तस्थुराविष्कृतं तदा ।।
data.es: The mighty monkeys came out of the entrance of the ironboundary wall from beneath and made their appearance and stood in full attention.
data.anv: ततः then, उदग्रसत्त्वाः with marked strength, सर्वे all, ते हरयः the monkeys, प्राकारपरिघान्तरात् crossing the ironboundary from beneath, निष्क्रम्य came out, तदा then, अविष्कृतम्  made their appearance, तस्थुः stood.
data.md: And getting over the ditch around the city walls, those terrible-looking monkeys stationed themselves openly.

data.v: सुग्रीवस्य प्रमादं च पूर्वजं चार्तमात्मवान् । बुद्ध्वा कोपवशं वीरः पुनरेव जगाम सः ।।
data.es: The sensible warrior, recognising Sugriva's dereliction of duty and his own brother's agony once again flew into fury.
data.anv: आत्मवान् sensible, सः वीरः that warrior, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva's, प्रमादम् dereliction, पूर्वजं च and his elder brother, आर्तम् helpless, बुद्ध्वा  recognising, पुनरेव once again, क्रोधवशम् under the grip of anger, जगाम was drawn.
data.md: And meditating upon Sugrīva's error and his brother's interest, the self-controlled Laksmana, heroic, proceeded on wards.

data.v: स दीर्घोष्णमहोच्छ्वासः कोपसंरक्तलोचनः । बभूव नरशार्दूलसधूम इव पावकः ।।
data.es: Sighing hot, deep breath, eyes turned red in anger, this tiger among men appeared like fire with smoke (The sigh was smoke and red eyes, fire).
data.anv: दीर्घोष्णमहोच्छवासः sighing with hot deep breath, कोपसंरक्तलोचनः with his eyes turned red out of anger, नरशार्दूलः tiger among men, सः he, सधूमः with smoke, पावकः इव like fire, बभूव appeared.
data.md: Sighing hot and hard, that best of men-Laks maņa, with reddened eyes appeared like to smoky fire.

data.v: बाणशल्यस्फुरज्जिह्वः सायकासनभोगवान् । स्वतेजोविषसंघातः पञ्चास्य इव पन्नगः ।।
data.es: His bow was like the hood of a snake,with the iron nails fixed on the tip of his arrows like moving fangs and his own brightness like the venom of the fivehooded snake.
data.anv: बाणशल्यस्फुरज्जिह्वः the iron nails fixed on the arrows as moving fangs, सायकासनभोगवान् bow as the snake, स्वतेजोविषसङ्घातः his own brightness as poison, पञ्चास्यः fivehooded, पन्नगः इव snake like.
data.md: He appeared like to a terrible serpent of five mouths having the top of the arrow for his tongue, the bow for his expanded hood and his own prowess for the poison.

data.v: तं दीप्तमिव कालाग्निं नागेन्द्रमिव कोपितम् । समासाद्याङ्गदस्त्रासाद्विषादमगमद्भृशम् ।।
data.es: Dismayed, Angada approached Lakshmana, who was glowing like fire at the time of dissolution of the world and enraged like the lord of serpents.
data.anv: अङ्गदः Angada, दीप्तम् glowing, कालाग्निम् इव like fire at the dissolution of the world, कोपितम् enraged, नागेन्द्रमिव like lord of snakes, तम् him, समासाद्य on nearing, त्रासात् with fear, भृशम् greatly, विषादम् worry, अगमत् felt.
data.md: Beholding him like the flaming fire of dissolution and enraged lord of serpents, Angada, out of fear, became exceedingly sorry.

data.v: सोऽङ्गदं रोषताम्राक्षः संदिदेश महायशाः । सुग्रीवः कथ्यतां वत्स ममागमनमित्युत ।।
data.es: Renowned Lakshmana, with his eyes turned red in anger said to Angada 'O dear, inform Sugriva, about my arrival'.
data.anv: रोषताम्राक्षः eyes red with anger, महायशाः renowned, सः he, अङ्गदम् to Angada, वत्स child, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, मम about my, आगमनम् arrival, कथ्यताम्  inform, इति उत thus, सन्दिदेश sent word.

data.v: एष रामानुजः प्राप्तस्त्वत्सकाशमरिंदमः । भ्रातुर्व्यसनसंतप्तो द्वारि तिष्ठति लक्ष्मणः ।।
data.es: 'O subduer of enemies speak in this way: 'Lakshmana, the dear younger brother of Rama has come to you and waits for your presence at the entrance, burning in grief of his elder brother. Well, if you like to hear his words, do as you please.' 'Return swiftly after saying so.'
data.anv: अरिन्दम O subduer of enemies, वत्स dear, भ्रातुः brother's, व्यसनसन्तप्तः burning in grief, रामानुजः Rama's younger brother, एषः लक्ष्मणः this Lakshmana, त्वत्सकाशम् to your presence, प्राप्तः arrived, द्वारि at the entrance, तिष्ठति stands, वानर Vanara, रुचिः यदि if you like, तस्य his, वाक्ये words, साधु well, क्रियताम् do accordingly, इति thus, उक्त्वा having spoken, शीघ्रम् swiftly, आगच्छ come.

data.v: लक्ष्मणस्य वचः श्रुत्वा शोकाविष्टोऽङ्गदोऽब्रवीत् । पितुः समीपमागम्य सौमित्रिरयमागतः ।।
data.es: On hearing Lakshmana's words Angada became sad. He approached his father (Sugriva) and said 'Saumitri has come'. (This sloka appears an interpolation).
data.anv: लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, शोकाविष्ट: griefstricken, अङ्गदः Angada, पितुः father's, समीपम् near, आगम्य reached, अयम् this, सौमित्रिः Saumitri, आगतः has come, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Hearing Laksmana's words, Angada overwhelmed with grief, approaching his uncle said-'Saumitree has arrived here.'

data.v: ते महौघनिभं दृष्ट्वा वज्राशनिसमस्वनम् । सिंहनादं समं चक्रुर्लक्ष्मणस्य समीपतः ।।
data.es: They saw Lakshmana advancing like a mighty flood and went near him making sounds like the thunderbolt or a lion.
data.anv: ते they, दृष्ट्वा  seeing, महौघनिभम् looked like a mighty flood, वज्राशनिसमस्वनम् noise like a thunderbolt, सिंहनादम् lion's roar, समम् like, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, समीपतः near, चक्रुः made.
data.md: They, approaching Lakşmaņa began to set up a terrible roar like to thunder and resembling the uproar of lions and the noise of water-falls.

data.v: तेन शब्देन महता प्रत्यबुध्यत वानरः । मदविह्वलताम्राक्षो व्याकुलस्रग्विभूषणः ।।
data.es: By the great sound (of the monkeys) the drunken redeyed vanara king awakened, his garlands and ornaments in disarray.
data.anv: महता by the great, तेन शब्देन by that sound, वानरः monkey, मदविह्वलताम्राक्षः having red eyes due to intoxication, व्याकुलस्रग्विभूषणः ornaments and garlands in disarry, प्रत्यबुध्यत awakened.
data.md: By that terrible sound awoke that monkeychief, having coppery eyes, agitated, adorned with garlands and possessed by liquor.

data.v: अथाङ्गदवचः श्रुत्वा तेनैव च समागतौ । मन्त्रिणो वानरेन्द्रस्य संमतोदारदर्शिनौ ।।
data.es: On hearing Angada's words the two ministers named Plaksha and Prabhava who were perrmitted to have audience with the queens went to the harem on invitation from Angada. They reported to Sugriva about the arrival of Lakshmana who had come to speak to him about matters regading wealth and righteousness.
data.anv: अथ then, अङ्गदवचः Angada's words, श्रुत्वा hearing, तेनैव along with him, समागतौ both of them assembled, सम्मतौ दारदर्शिनौ both of them permitted to have audience with womenfolk, अर्थधर्मयोः in matters of wealth and righteousness, मन्त्रिणौ ministers, प्लक्षश्चैव Plaksha and, प्रभावश्च Prabhava also, तौ both, वानरेन्द्रस्य the king's, मन्त्रिणौ both ministers, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana's, प्राप्तम् arrived, वक्तुम् to tell, उच्चावचम् to talk , शंसतुः both of them spoke.

data.v: प्लक्षश्चैव प्रभावश्च मन्त्रिणावर्थधर्मयोः । वक्तुमुच्चावचं प्राप्तं लक्ष्मणं तौ शशंसतुः ।।
data.es: On hearing Angada's words the two ministers named Plaksha and Prabhava who were perrmitted to have audience with the queens went to the harem on invitation from Angada. They reported to Sugriva about the arrival of Lakshmana who had come to speak to him about matters regading wealth and righteousness.
data.anv: अथ then, अङ्गदवचः Angada's words, श्रुत्वा hearing, तेनैव along with him, समागतौ both of them assembled, सम्मतौ दारदर्शिनौ both of them permitted to have audience with womenfolk, अर्थधर्मयोः in matters of wealth and righteousness, मन्त्रिणौ ministers, प्लक्षश्चैव Plaksha and, प्रभावश्च Prabhava also, तौ both, वानरेन्द्रस्य the king's, मन्त्रिणौ both ministers, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana's, प्राप्तम् arrived, वक्तुम् to tell, उच्चावचम् to talk , शंसतुः both of them spoke.
data.md: Hearing the words of Angada, the tow counsellors of Sugrīva, intelligent and of magnificent looks, along with him, approached that lord of monkeys. And those two ministers Yaksa and Prabhava, to give him proper counsels, informed (that monkey-chief) of the arrival of Lakşmaņa.

data.v: प्रसादयित्वा सुग्रीवं वचनैः सामनिश्चितैः । आसीनं पर्युपासीनौ यथा शक्रं मरुत्पतिम् ।।
data.es: Both of them sat close by Sugriva who was like Indra and said these pleasing words:
data.anv: आसीनम् seated, सुग्रीवम् Sugriva, मरुत्पतिम् lord of Maruts, शक्रं यथा like Indra, पर्युपासीनौ both seated close, सामनिश्चितैः by conciliatory words, वचनैः with words, प्रसादयित्वा after pleasing.

data.v: सत्यसंधौ महाभागौ भ्रातरौ रामलक्ष्मणौ । वयस्य भावं संप्राप्तौ राज्यार्हौ राज्यदायिनौ ।।
data.es: 'Rama and Lakshmana, both the brothers venerable and true to their promise, have conferred on you sovereignty and have extended friendship.'
data.anv: सत्यसन्धौ both true to their promise, महाभागौ both venerable, राज्यार्हौ  deserving kingdom, राज्यदायिनौ have given sovereignty, भ्रातरौ two brothers, रामलक्ष्मणौ Rama and Lakshmana, वयस्यभावम् friendship, सम्प्राप्तौ extended .

data.v: तयोरेको धनुष्पाणिर्द्वारि तिष्ठति लक्ष्मणः । यस्य भीताः प्रवेपन्ते नादान्मुञ्चन्ति वानराः ।।
data.es: 'Of the two, only Lakshmana is standing at the entrance wielding his bow in hand. The monkeys are trembling in fear and running about, making a loud noise'.
data.anv: तयोः between the two, एकः only, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, धनुष्पाणिः wielding a bow in his hand, द्वारि at the entrance, तिष्ठति is standing, यस्य his, भीताः frightened ones, प्रवेपन्तः are trembling, वानराः monkeys, नादान् sounds, मुञ्चन्ति are producing.

data.v: स एष राघवभ्राता लक्ष्मणो वाक्यसारथिः । व्यवसाय रथः प्राप्तस्तस्य रामस्य शासनात् ।।
data.es: 'By the command of Rama, his brother has come to you, Rama's words as charioteer and his work as chariot'.
data.anv: तस्य his, रामस्य Rama's, शासनात् by the command, राघवभ्राता Rama's brother, सः एषः लक्ष्मणः that Lakshmna, वाक्यसारथिः his words as a charioteer, व्यवसायरथः his work a chariot, पाप्तः has come.
data.md: That Laksmana, Raghava's brother, having words for his charioteer, and perseverance for his chariot, has approached you at his brother's command.

data.v: तस्य मूर्ध्ना प्रणम्य त्वं सपुत्रः सह बन्धुभिः । राजंस्तिष्ठ स्वसमये भव सत्यप्रतिश्रवः ।।
data.es: 'O great king Go at once with your son and relations, salute him now and avert his anger'.
data.anv: महाराज O great king, त्वम् you, सपुत्रः with your son, सहबान्धवः with your relations, शीघ्रम् quickly, गच्छ go, मूर्ध्ना face, तस्य his, प्रणम्य after saluting, अद्य now, रोषः anger, निवर्त्यताम् may be averted.
data.md: Bowing to him, with your children and friends, do you, O king, satisfying your promise, seek his shelter like to a wife placing herself under the control of her husband.

data.v: अङ्गदस्य वचः श्रुत्वा सुग्रीवः सचिवैः सह । लक्ष्मणं कुपितं श्रुत्वा मुमोचासनमात्मवान् ।।
data.es: On hearing about Lakshmana's anger from Angada, prudent Sugriva consulted his counsellors.
data.anv: आत्मवान् prudent, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, सचिवैः सह with his counsellors, अङ्गदस्य Angada's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा heard, लक्ष्मणम् of Lakshmana's, कुपितम् an angry man, श्रुत्वा heard, आसनम् seat, मुमोच started
data.md: Hearing the words of Angada as well as of Laksmana's wrath, the self-controlled Sugriva along with his counsellors, left his seat.

data.v: सचिवानब्रवीद्वाक्यं निश्चित्य गुरुलाघवम् । मन्त्रज्ञान्मन्त्रकुशलो मन्त्रेषु परिनिष्ठितः ।।
data.es: Sugriva, being skilled in secret assessment of matters, considering the merits and demerits, spoke to his council of ministers capable of intelligent counselling:
data.anv: मन्त्रकुशलः well versed in counsel, मन्त्रेषु in counselling, परिनिष्ठितान्  highly skilled in secret assessment, सः he, गुरुलाघवम् considering the merits and demerits, निश्चित्य deciding, मन्त्रज्ञान् intelligent ministers, तान् them, वाक्यम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
data.md: Ascertaining the weight and lightness of the present occasion, that one, expert in counsels and abiding by their advice spoke to the expert counsellors, saying.

data.v: न मे दुर्व्याहृतं किंचिन्नापि मे दुरनुष्ठितम् । लक्ष्मणो राघवभ्राता क्रुद्धः किमिति चिन्तये ।।
data.es: 'Indeed I have not uttered any harsh word or done anything wrong. I, therefore, wonder why Rama's brother, Lakshmana is angry with me?
data.anv: मे of me, किञ्चित् a little, न दुर्व्याहृतम् not uttered any harsh or arrogant word, मे of me, अपि दुरनुष्ठितम् indeed no wrong deed is done, राघव भ्राता Rama's brother, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, किम् why, क्रुद्धः angry, इति this, चिन्तये I am thinking.
data.md: I have not done him any wrong, nor have I spoken to him any improper word. I do not know why Rāghava's brother Laksmana has become offended with me.

data.v: असुहृद्भिर्ममामित्रैर्नित्यमन्तरदर्शिभिः । मम दोषानसंभूताञ्श्रावितो राघवानुजः ।।
data.es: 'Some enemies, who are always searching for imaginary faults of mine might have poisoned Lakshmana's ears.
data.anv: राघवानुजः Rama's younger brother, असुहृद्भि: heartless people, नित्यम् always, अन्तरदर्शिभिः picking holes at me, अमित्रैः by enmies, मम my, असम्भूतान् imaginary, दोषान् faults, श्रावितः have told.
data.md: Lakşmaņa has been falsely apprised of my imaginary weakness by my enemies, always looking to my dark sides.

data.v: अत्र तावद्यथाबुद्धि सर्वैरेव यथाविधि । भवद्भिर्निश्चयस्तस्य विज्ञेयो निपुणं शनैः ।।
data.es: 'In the meanwhile, (right now) all of you should think quietly and try to know the reason (for Lakshmana's anger), using your intellect and expertise logically and decide( the course of action).
data.anv: अत्र now, सर्वैरेव by all of you, तावत् in the mean while, यथा बुद्धि  using your intellect , यथाविधि duly, भावस्य your own, निश्चयः decision, तावत् that much, निपुणम् expertise, शनैः slowly, विज्ञेयः inform.
data.md: It behoveth you all, to ascertain now speedily according to your knowledge and right understanding (the cause of Laksmana's wrath).

data.v: न खल्वस्ति मम त्रासो लक्ष्मणान्नापि राघवात् । मित्रं त्वस्थान कुपितं जनयत्येव संभ्रमम् ।।
data.es: 'I have no fear either from Lakshmana or from Rama. However, when a friend is enraged without reason, it creates misgivings.
data.anv: मम my, लक्ष्मणात् from Lakshmana, त्रासः fear, नास्ति खलु not expected, राघवादपि even from Rama, न not, अस्थानकोपितम् enraged without reason, मित्रम् friend, सम्भ्रमम् misgivings, जनयत्येव  will create.
data.md: I do not fear Lakşmaņa or Rāghava; but friends enraged without any cause do invariable produce fear.

data.v: सर्वथा सुकरं मित्रं दुष्करं परिपालनम् । अनित्यत्वात्तु चित्तानां प्रीतिरल्पेऽपि भिद्यते ।।
data.es: 'It is easy to earn a friend but keeping the friendship sustained is difficult. Due to fickleness of mind friendship gets broken even on flimsy grounds.
data.anv: सर्वथा always, मित्रम् friend, सुकरम् easy, परिपालनम् to maintain friendship, दुष्करम् is difficult, चित्तानाम् of mind, अल्पेऽपि even on flimsy ground, प्रीतिः friendship, अनित्यत्वात्  fickleness, भिद्यते will break.
data.md: It is easy to contract friendship but very difficult to sustain it; for owing to the fickleness of our minds, a very slight cause bring about separation.

data.v: अतोनिमित्तं त्रस्तोऽहं रामेण तु महात्मना । यन्ममोपकृतं शक्यं प्रतिकर्तुं न तन्मया ।।
data.es: 'Therefore, I am apprehensive of Rama. I am not able to repay the help he has rendered to me'.
data.anv: अतः निमित्तम् therefore, for that reason, अहम् I am, महात्मना by the noble sire, रामेण by Rama, त्रस्तः  am apprehensive, मम me, यत् whatever, उपकृतम् has been done, तत् that, मया me, प्रतिकर्तुम् to return, न शक्यम्  not able to.
data.md: I have not done him any good proportionate to what the high-souled Rāma had done for me; and it is for this reason that I am afraid of him.

data.v: सुग्रीवेणैवमुक्तस्तु हनुमान्हरिपुंगवः । उवाच स्वेन तर्केण मध्ये वानरमन्त्रिणाम् ।।
data.es: When Sugriva spoke thus, Hanuman the great monkey, submitted in the presnce of the monkeyministers, applying his own logic:
data.anv: सुग्रीवेण by Sugriva, एवम् in that way, उक्तस्तु been said, हरिपुङ्गवः best of monkeys, हनुमान् Hanuman, वानरमन्त्रिणाम् among monkeys ministers, मध्य in the midst, स्वेन by his own, तर्केण logic, उवाच said these words.
data.md: Being thus addressed by Sugrīva-Hanumān, the foremost of monkey-counsellors spoke, according to his own understanding, saying.

data.v: सर्वथा नैतदाश्चर्यं यत्त्वं हरिगणेश्वर । न विस्मरसि सुस्निग्धमुपकारकृतं शुभम् ।।
data.es: 'It is not at all a matter of surprise, O king of vanara clan, that you forgot the good service rendered to you with utmost sense of friendship.
data.anv: हरिगणेश्वर chief of the vanara clan, त्वम् to you, सुस्निग्धम्  with utmost sense of friendship, कृतम् done, शुभम् good, न विस्मरसि इति यत् forgetting like this, एतत् this way, सर्वथा always, आश्चर्यम् surprise, न no.
data.md: It is no wonder, O lord of monkeys, that you had not forgot the unexpected benefit, (you hadst received at the hands of Rāma).

data.v: राघवेण तु शूरेण भयमुत्सृज्य दूरतः । त्वत्प्रियार्थं हतो वाली शक्रतुल्यपराक्रमः ।।
